GK16ruvyavivya_pu:3: evaṃ tāvat prathame vimarśe dhvanilakṣaṇaṃ dūṣayitvā dhvaniśāstragataṃ granthāntaraṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:4: dūṣayituṃ sāmānyena tāvat kāvyagatam anaucityollāsarūpaṃ dūṣaṇaprapañcam upapādayitum
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:11: ityādinā / bahiraṅgam iti vācyamukhena rase paryavasānād vidheyaḥ prādhānyena pratipipādayiṣito yo 'rthas tasya avimarśo 'nanusaṃdhānam upasarjanīkaraṇāt
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:12: prakramaḥ kasya cid vastuno nirvāhāyārambhas tasya bhedo madhye 'nyathīkaraṇam anyathānirvāhaś ca /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:13: kramasya paripāṭyā bheda ullaṅghanaṃ vyutkrama iti yāvat /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:17: yad etad ihagranthakṛtā vicārasaraṇim āśritya vidheyāvimarśādidoṣapañcakam udbhāvitaṃ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:21: dāsyāḥ putra ityādāv ākrośe ṣaṣṭhyā alukaṃ pratipādayatā sūtrakṛtā vidheyāvimarśaḥ sūcita eva /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:22: tathā svāmīśvarādhipatidāyādety atra sūtre na hi bhavati gavāṃ svāmī aśveṣu ca iti vadatā bhāṣyakṛtā spaṣṭam eva prakramabhedaḥ pratipāditaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:23: tathā kṛñcānuprayujyate liṭi iy atrānuprayogasyānuśabdaparyālocanayā vyavahitapūrvaprayogaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:24: taṃ pātayāṃ prathamam āsa ityādau niṣedhatā cādīnāṃ ca na hi bhavati ca vṛkṣaḥ ityādinā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:25: prayoganiyamakhyāpanena dyotakatvaṃ kathayatā asthānaprayogalakṣaṇaḥ kramabhedaḥ kaṭākṣita eva /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:26: tathā karmadhārayamatvarthīyābhyāṃ bahuvrīhir laghutvāt syād iti vṛttilāghavaṃ cintayatā kātyāyanena paunaruktyam api prakāśitam eva /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:27: tathā īṣad asamāptau ity atra pratijñānasamadhigamyaṃ sūtrakāroktaṃ rūpakalakṣaṇam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:28: arthaṃ dūṣayatā prakṛtyarthasadṛśe kalpavādividhānam iti pratijñānasamadhigamyārthabhūtām
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:29: upamāṃ vyavasthāpayatopamāśrayeṇa vācyāvacanam api dyotitam eva /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:31: tad evaṃ mahāviduṣāṃ mārgam anusṛtya sahṛdayaśikṣādarāya vicārayandaraṃto 'sya mahāmater na kaś cit paryanuyogaleśasyāpy avasara ity alam atiprasaṅgena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:33: doṣā iti kāvyasya vikṛtatvāpādanād dūṣaṇād doṣā iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:39: chātrābhyarthanayeti praṣṭṛtvasyāṅgīkṛtam iti prativaktṛtvasya ca nirdeśaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:41: nanu yadi parakīye kāvye parihārāya doṣāṇāṃ vicāraḥ kriyate,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:42: tat kiṃ nijakāvye na teṣāṃ parihāraḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:43: tathā ca bhajate mātsaryamaunaṃ nu kim ity ato 'nantaram iti pṛṣṭa ity evaṃ krameṇetiśabdo nirdeśyaḥ kramāntareṇa nirdeśāt kramabhedo na yujyate
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:45: tadartham āha - svakṛtiṣv iti kṛtiḥ kāvyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:46: saṃrambha iti kutsitāḥ kariṇaḥ karikīṭāḥ kutsitāni kutsanaiḥ iti samāsaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:48: meghaśakalānāṃ tu kalpāntatoyadaiḥ ya ity atraiva cchedaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:49: ayaṃ śloko vakroktijīvite vitatya vyākhyāta iti tata evāvadhāryaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:52: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ - samarthaḥ padavidhiḥ iti vacanāt samāsaḥ sāmarthyanimittakaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:56: paryudāsasyaiva viśeṣaṇaṃ nañā abrāhmaṇa iti yathā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:57: na cātra vakṣyamāṇanyāyena paryudāso ghaṭata iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:58: nanv abrāhmaṇa ityādau nañ kathaṃ viśeṣaṇam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:60: na ca nañśabdo viruddhatvād vidhim uparañjayati /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:63: abrāhmaṇa ityādau brāhmaṇaśabdo brāhmaṇasadṛśe kṣatriyādau vartate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:64: sā cākṣatriyādau brāhmaṇaśabdasya vṛttir nañā dyotyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:65: tad uktam - nañ ivayuktam anyasadṛśādhikaraṇe tatha hy artha iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:69: yatra vidheḥ prādhānyaṃ pratiṣedhasyāprādhānyaṃ naña uttarapadena saṃbandhaḥ samarthasamāsa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:70: ekavākyatvaṃ ca tatra paryudāsaḥ kiṃ cid varjayitvā kasya cid upadeśo nirāsa iti nigamanāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:71: tatra kārikāyāṃ trayaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ dvayaṃ cākṣipyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:74: tatrāpy atrastatvādeḥ siddhatvāt tadanuvādena gopanādi vidhīyata iti paryudāsatvam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:76: yatra pratiṣedhasya prādhānyaṃ vidher aprādhānyyaṃ nañaḥ kriyāpadena saṃbandho 'samarthasamāsaḥ vākyabhedaś ca,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:77: tatra prasajya prāpayya pratiṣedha iti prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:78: atra kārikāyāṃ traye nirdiṣṭe 'nyad dvayam ākṣiptam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:83: saṃrabdhavān yaḥ puruṣas tadgatā yeyaṃ saṃrabdhatā saṃrambhaṇakriyā tasyā vakṣyamāṇanyāyena pratiṣedha ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:84: asaṃradhavadvidhir iti saṃrabdhavatsadṛśasya saṃrambhasadṛśakriyākarttur udāsīnaprāyasya vidhir ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:85: yad uktaṃ nañ iva yuktam ityādi /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:88: tatsiddhipakṣa iti vivakṣito yaḥ pradhānabhūtaniṣedhalakṣaṇo 'rthasya siddhipakṣa ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:91: samāse hi nañarthopasarjana uttarapadārthaḥ prādhānyena pratīyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:93: atra vyavacchedyaṃ prasajyapratiṣedhaṃ pradarśya paricchedyaṃ paryudāsam udāharati /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:94: nanu prasajyapratiṣedhe nañaḥ kriyānvaye 'saṃrabdahavān ity atra saṃrambhakriyāniṣedho bhaviṣyati /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:98: asaṃrabdhavān ity atra dvāv aṃśau kriyāṃśaḥ kārakāṃśaś ca /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:99: tatrobhayāṃśabhāgarthaniṣedhe śabdaśaktisvābhāvyād vākye kriyāṃśaniṣedhas tasya prādhānyena vivakṣitasyāparāmarśam anuktād vidheyāvimarśaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100: yathā ca prasajyapratiṣedhe samāso neṣṭas tathoktanayena paryudāse 'py asamāso neṣyata
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:101: ity āha - nanu sādhv iti atra na kurvateti karaṇakriyākartṛsadṛśena kriyāṃ praty
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103: akurvateti vācye na kurvateti kriyāṃśaniṣedhaḥ pratīter vaiparītyakārī /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:104: evaṃ nocitam apīty ucitatvamātraniṣedhaḥ pratīter vaiparītyakṛd eva /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:111: tatrāpi kartraṃśaḥ pradhānaṃ na kriyāṃśaḥ karttari khaśo vidhānād iti pūrvavad avaseyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:112: bhuṅkta iti atra hi vākyasya kriyāprādhānyaṃ pratīyamānabhavatyādikriyāpekṣe nañaḥ samanvaye śrāddhabhojī na bhavatīti vākyārthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:113: aśrāddhabhojīty atra tu nañā bhoktus samanvaye śrāddhabhoktṛvyatirikto 'pi vighasāśyā+i++ pratīyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115: tata eva samarthasamāsas tadviparyayeṇāsamarthasamāsaś ca kārikādvayenoktaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:116: vākyabhedābhedayos tu sāmarthyāt pratītir ity avacanam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:117: evakemaṃ vidheyāvimarśaṃ vicārya dvitīyam udāharati - yo 'sāv ity atreti tacchabdaṃ praty ākāṅkṣāyāḥ kenāpy anivarttanāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:124: paryudāse tu viparyaya ity uktaṃ prāg /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:126: yattador nityābhisaṃbandhe 'pi śabdaśaktisvābhāvyād yado 'nuvādyaviṣayatvaṃ tado vidheyaviṣayatvam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:131: tatra dvayī gatiḥ - anyatarānupādānaṃ dvayor anupādānaṃ vā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:136: sā kalā yā prasiddheti sphuṭatvena pratīteḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:139: te iti ye mayaivānubhūte ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:141: atra sa iti yaḥ prakrānta ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:142: upāttavastv iti vakṣyamāṇaśloke ko 'pīti yad upāttaṃ vastu tadviṣayatvenety arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:144: tacchabdāt prayogātiprasaṅganiyamaṃ prakāśayan parihāryaṃ viṣayaṃ pradarśayati /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:148: kartṛtveneti prādhānyaṃ sūcayati aprādhānyasya parāmarśo na duṣyatīti khyāpanārtham /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:152: asamanvayād iti tacchabdasya parokṣārthapratipādakatve saṃbandhavirodhād ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:157: kalpitaṃ tad yac chabdanirdiṣṭaṃ karmādi viṣayo 'syeti yacchabdārthaḥ karmakaraṇāditayā viṣayatvenāsya kalpita ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160: yacchabdasamīpe samānādhikaraṇas tacchabda upādīyamānaḥ śabdaśaktisvābhāvyāt prasiddhavastuviṣayaṃ yacchabam ākāṅkṣati /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:161: vaiyadhikaraṇyena vyavadhānena ca nirdeśe tu nirdiṣṭenaiva yadā samanvayaṃ bhajate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:163: śṛṇoti tasmād api yaḥ sa pāpabhāg ity atra yady api yaḥ sa iti yattador nairantaryeṇa sāmānādhikaraṇyena ca nirdeśaḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:164: tathāpi na yat tad ūrjitam iti nyāyena tacchabdo yacchabdāntaraṃ praty apekṣāyām iha yadi tacchabdo nirantaropāttayacchabdāpekṣayaiva prayujyate,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:166: yāvatā na kevalaṃ ya ity atra yacchabdāpekṣayā vyavadhānena prādhānyāt prayuktas
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:169: tad itthaṃ yattador upakramopasaṃhārakramo dvividhaḥ parighaṭitaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:170: sa cātra śloke na yujyata ity āha - evaṃ ceti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:172: yacchabdo nātra tad eti prakrāntas tacchabdaḥ parāmṛśyate tatsaṃbandhapratītāv ity arthaḥ.
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:173: nanu prayogadarśanam evātra samarthakaṃ bhaviṣyatīty āśaṅkya prayogasya prāmādikapāṭhaviparyāsahetukatvam āha - mīlitam iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:177: kevalādaśśabdapryoge asau marud ityādau yacchabdākāṅkṣā syād ity ekaṃ yacchabdasahāyasyādaśśabdasya prayoge yo 'sau jagattrayetyādau prayuktatacchabdākāṅkṣā na syād iti dvitīyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:178: atra yasya prakopetyadaśśabdarahitayacchabdaprayogo dṛṣṭāntatvenokto yathāsya kevalasya tacchabdākāṅkṣā tathādaśśabdayuktasyāpīty arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:179: parikalpyata iti tasya yathoktavastv iti yathā avigānena śiṣṭaprasiddhipāraṃparyeṇoktaṃ vastu tacchabdārthavivikto viṣayas tasya tanmate asaṃbhavaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:180: tvayā hy adaśśabdasya tacchabdārthatvam ucyate tatra yacchabdaparāmarśāpekṣāprasaṅgaḥ ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185: yadi tu tām iti tadabhinnārthatānupapattiḥ parāmṛṣṭā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188: yenaiva pathā eko gacchati tenaivāvicāritenaiva yo gacchati sa ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:205: sutarām iti idamādisāhityena prayukto yacchabdaḥ svabhāvato vikāsitāsya eva tacchabdaṃ pratīkṣate,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:207: etac ca krameṇodāhṛtaṃ yad etad iti,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:209: tad anyena granthena pradarśaka upayujyate tadvad asya yacchabdasya na prakrāntaparāmarśe saṃbandho,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:211: sa ca satkāvyakalaṅkāyamāno heya eva anuktvaiveti yattador madhye parāmṛśyam anuktvā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:212: yatra nirantaraḥ prayogaḥ yathā yat tad ūrjitam ityādau tatra tayor yattador yathāyogaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:213: punaḥ prayogo na duṣyati yatha nūnaṃ tad api hāritam ityādau /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:215: nirantaranirdiṣṭeṣv idamādiṣu satsu tayor yattadoḥ teṣām idamādīnāṃ ca saṅghaṭitatvena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:216: sthitānāṃ yathāyogaṃ yattadoḥ pratyavekṣā na nivarttate yathā aprayukteṣv idamādiṣu
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:217: kevalayoḥ pṛthagavasthitayor apekṣā na nivarttate tadvat prayukteṣv apīty arthaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:222: yacchabdasya pṛthag idamādisāhitye tacchabdasya ca pṛthag idamādisāhitye yattadoḥ parasparasāhitye ca bahavo bhedāḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:229: ārtho 'pi yacchabdamātrānupādāne tacchabdasyopāttasya prasiddhānubhūtaprakrāntaviṣayeṇa yadābhisaṃbandhāt trividhaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:230: yacchabdasya ca tacchabdānupādāne kevalam upāttasya prakrāntaviṣayeṇa kalpitatatkarmādiviṣayeṇa ca tadābhisaṃbandhād dvividhaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:231: ubhayānupādāne tu dvayor upāttavastuviṣayatākalpana eka eva bhedaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:232: evaṃ śābdo dvividha ārthaḥ ṣaḍbheda ity aṣṭavidho yattador upakramopasaṃhārakramaḥ puṣṭaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:234: yat tadūrjitam ityādau tu śābdasyārthasya copasaṃhārakramasya saṅkīrṇatvam iti nāsya pṛthagbhāvaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:235: apuṣṭasya duṣṭamadhye prasaṅgena varṇayiṣyamāṇatvād idānīṃ duṣṭo vyākriyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:236: tatra yattadoḥ sthāne tacchabdayacchabdanairantaryeṇa sāmānādhikaraṇyena cedamādīnaṃ duṣṭataiva teṣām atadarthatvāt tannikaṭe ca prayujyamānānāṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:239: viprakṛṣṭatvena sannikṛṣṭatve 'pi vaiyadhikaraṇyena vā teṣām prayoge na duṣṭaṃ nāduṣṭam ity apuṣṭatvam eva yathā yo 'vikalpam iti smṛtibhūḥ smṛtibhūr iti ca /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:244: api tu kārakāntaram api prādhānyena vivakṣitatvāt pratyakṣāyamāṇam / tena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:247: iti medinyās tacchabdaparāmarśo na sundara ity āhuḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:248: yathā yattadoḥ padārthavākyārthagatatvena dvividhāvasthāne yad ekasya padārthaniṣṭhatvād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:249: anyasya vākyārthaviṣayatvaṃ tad bhinnaviṣayatvena nityābhisaṃbandhaparipanthi duṣṭam eva / yathā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:250: hemrāṃ bhāraśatāni vā madamucāṃ bṛndāni vā dantināṃ śrīharṣeṇa yad arpitāni guṇine bāṇāya kutrādya tat /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:251: yā bāṇena tu tasya sūktivisarair uṭṭaṅkitāḥ kīrttayas tat kalpapralaye 'pi yānti na manāṅ manye parimlānatām //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:252: iti / yā iti padārthaviṣayatvam anipātasya tacchabdasya /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:255: atraiva yad bāṇena tu tasyeti tāḥ kalpapralaye 'pi iti ca pāṭhe yado vākyārthaviṣayatve tadaḥ padārthaniṣṭhatva udāharaṇaṃ deyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:256: tasmād yā bāṇena tv iti tāḥ kalpapralaye 'pīti ca paṭhanīyam / iha tu
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:257: indīvaraṃ yadatasīkusumasya vṛttyā yat ketakaṃ jaraḍhabhūrjadalānuvṛttyā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:258: yan manyase ca vakulaṃ karavīravṛttyā sā sāmprataṃ madhupa hanta tavaiva hāniḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:261: yadi paraṃ sa vākyārtho hānipadena piṇḍīkṛtya prakāśitas tacchabdena parāmṛṣṭaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:265: kiṃ ca yattador nityābhisaṃbandhād guṇapradhānayoś ca saṃbandhārhatvāt parāmṛśya ekatra yacchabdavākye tacchabdavākye vā nirdiṣṭa itaravākye tadā yadā vā pratyavamṛśyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:266: yacchabdavākye tu nirdiṣṭena yacchabdāntareṇa guṇānāṃ pradhānānāṃ ca parasparam abhisaṃbandhāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:267: evaṃ ca tathā parāmarśe dvau duṣṭābhedau / yathā:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:268: yeṣāṃ tās tridaśebhadānasaritaḥ pītāḥ pratāpoṣmabhir līlāpānabhuvaś ca nandanatarucchāyāsu yaiḥ kalpitāḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:269: yeṣāṃ huṅkṛtayaḥ kṛtāmarapurakṣobhāḥ kṣapācāriṇāṃ kiṃ tais tvatparitoṣakāri vihitaṃ kiṃ cit pravādocitam //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:270: iti / kṣapācāriṇām iti ṣaṣṭhyantaṃ yacchabdena saṃbaddhaṃ yacchadbāntareṇa partyavamṛṣṭam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:272: evaṃ tacchabdavākye nirdiṣṭaṃ yacchabdaiḥ parāmṛśyamānaṃ na duṣyati, yathā ca:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:273: puṇḍrekṣoḥ paripākapāṇḍunibiḍe yo madhyame parvaṇi khyātaḥ kiṃ ca rasaḥ kaṣāyamadhuro yo rājajambūphale /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:274: tasyāsvādadaśāviluṇṭanapaṭur yeṣāṃ vacovibhramaḥ sarvatraiva jayanti citramatayas te bharttṛmeṇḍādayaḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:275: iti / atra dvitīye yacchabdavākye rasaḥ parāmṛśyo nirdiṣṭas tacchabdena parāmṛśyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:276: prathame yacchabdavākye tu yacchadaparāmarśo na yujyate dvayor asaṃbandhād, yathā:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:277: namo 'stu tābhyo bhuvane jayanti tāḥ sudhāmucas tāś ca kavīndrasūktayaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:278: bhavaikavicchedi kathāśarīratām upaiti yāsāṃ caritaṃ pinākinaḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:279: iti kavīndrasūktīnāṃ tacchabdavati vākyena nirdiṣṭānāṃ tacchabdāntareṇa parāmarśo na yuktaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:280: kiṃ ca yattacchabdayoḥ svabhāvena vākyabhedotthāpakatve yad ekataravākye 'nyatarat padaṃ prayujyānyatarat prayujyate tad api duṣṭam eva / yathā:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:281: aprākṛtasya caritātiśayaiś ca dṛṣṭair atyadbhutair apahṛtasya tathāpi nāsthā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:282: ko 'py eṣa vīraśiśukākṛtir aprameyamāhātmyasārasam udāyamayaḥ padārthaḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:285: ekatrāpi vākye guṇakriyādigataṃ kalpitaṃ bhedam āśritya prakrāntavastuviṣayatacchabdaprayoge
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:286: pradhānakriyāyāṃ parāmṛśyasya pradhānatvād eva svarūpeṇa nirdeśe guṇakriyādiviṣaye
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:287: tu tacchabdena parāmarśe nyāyye yadviparyayakaraṇaṃ tad duṣṭam eva / yathā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:288: prajānām eva bhūtyarthaṃ sa tābhyo balim agrahīt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:289: sahasraguṇam utsraṣṭum ādatte hi rasaṃ raviḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:290: iti / baliṃ prajābhyo jagrāha sa tāsām eva bhūtaye iti yuktaḥ pāṭhaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:291: tathaikaviṣayatve yattador ekasya dravyādiviṣayatve 'nyasya kālādigocaratve duṣṭam eva / yathā:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:292: tvam evaṃ saundaryā sa ca ruciratāyāḥ paricitaḥ kalānāṃ sīmānaṃ param iha yuvām eva bhajathaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:293: ayi/ dvandvaṃ diṣṭyā tad iti subhage/
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:294: saṃvadati vāmataḥ śeṣaṃ yat syāj jitam iha tadānīṃ guṇitayā //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:295: atra ataḥ śeṣaṃ cet syād iti paṭhanīyaṃ cec chabdasya yadiśabdārthatvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:296: tathā prakrāntaviṣayatve tacchabdasya vyavasthite tadviṣaye prakramyamāṇavastugocaratvaṃ doṣa eva / yathā:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:297: ye saṃtoṣasukhaprabuddhamanasas teṣāṃ na bhinno mado ye 'py ete dhanalobhasaṃkuladhiyas teṣāṃ tu dūre nṛṇām /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:298: itthaṃ kasya kṛte kṛtaḥ sa vidhinā tādṛk padaṃ saṃpadāṃ svātmany eva samāptahemamahimā merur na me rocate //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:299: atra meruḥ prakramyamāṇaḥ sa ity anena parāmṛṣṭaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:302: tīrthe tadīye gajasetubandhāt pratīpagām uttarato 'sya gaṅgām /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:303: iti deyam / tathā nirvīpsenaikenopakrame savīpsenānyena parāmarśo duṣṭa eva / yathā:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:304: yaḥ kalyāṇabahirbhūtaḥ sa sa durgatim aśnute /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:305: savīpsena tv ekena prakrame nirvīpsenānyenopasaṃhāraḥ savīpsasya pratyavamṛṣṭatvād na duṣṭānvayaḥ kin tv apuṣṭa eva / yathā:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:306: kalyāṇānāṃ tvam asi mahasāmīśiṣe tvaṃ vidhatse puṇyāṃ lakṣmīm iha mayi ciraṃ dhehi deva/ prasīda /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:308: namrasya tan me bhadraṃ bhadraṃ vitara bhagavan/
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:310: iti / atra yad yad iti nirdiṣṭaṃ kevalena tacchabdena parāmṛṣṭam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:312: tacchabdasya tu savīpsasya nirvīpsena parāmarśa udāharaṇaṃ yathā:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:313: kṣāntaṃ na kṣamayā gṛhocitasukhaṃ tyaktaṃ na santoṣataḥ soḍho dussahaśītavātatapanakleśo na taptaṃ tapaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:314: dhyātaṃ nityam ahar niśaṃ niyamitaprāṇair na śambhoḥ padaṃ tat tat karma kṛtaṃ yad eva munibhis tais taiḥ phalair vañcitāḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:315: iti / yatra tu savīpsasya prakrame savīpsena pratyavamarśas tatra puṣṭatvam eva yathā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:316: yo yaḥ śastraṃ bibhartti svabhujagurum adaḥ pāṇḍavīnāṃ camūnāṃ yo yaḥ pāñcālagotre śiśur adhikavayā garbhaśayyāṃ gato vā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:317: yo yas tatkarmasākṣī carati mayi raṇe yaś ca yaś ca pradīptaḥ krodhāndhas tasya tasya svayam api jagatām antakasyāntako 'ham //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:318: iti / yatra cānekasya savīpsasya cānekena pratyavamarśas,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:320: yo yo yaṃ yam avāpnuyād avayavoddeśaṃ spṛśan pāṇinā tat tanmātrakam eva yatra sa sa te rūpaṃ paraṃ manyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:322: nīto 'si durvedhasā ko nāmātra bhaved batākhilabhavan māhātmyavedī janaḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:323: iti / yadi paraṃ yaṃ yam iti prakrame tat tanmātrakam eveti pratyavamarśe vidheyāvimarśaḥ savīpsasya tadarthasya samāse guṇībhāvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:326: taccāvadhāryamāṇaparatantram ity avadhāryamāṇasyaiva savīpsasya tadarthasyodrekāt prādhānyam akhaṇḍitam eva /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:327: pūrvapadārthaprādhānyena kva cit supsupeti samāso dṛśyate, yathā:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:328: nirvāṇabhūyiṣṭham athāsya vīryaṃ sandhukṣayantīva vapur guṇena /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:330: iti / atra hi bhūyiṣṭhaṃ nirvāṇaṃ nirvāṇabhūyiṣṭham iti samāse nirvāṇārthasyaiva prādhānyaṃ tasya vīryaviśeṣaṇatvenāvasthitatvād /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:331: na tadvad iha tattanmātrakam iti tadarthasya prādhānyaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:333: tasminn api vā kṛte evaśabdaḥ kimarthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:334: evaśabda eva vā kiṃ na kriyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:337: na paunaruktyaṃ tan tameveti kevalaivaśabdaprayoge vikṣipta iva tadarthaḥ pratīyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:338: mātragrahaṇe tu piṇḍitasyaiva tadarthasya pratītir ity asti viśeṣaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:339: yadi paraṃ dvayor upādānaṃ lokapratītyanusaraṇena dṛḍhīkṛtāvadhāraṇapratītyartham /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:341: yathā - bālā kevalam eva roditi galallolodakair aśrubhiḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:342: atraiva tad iti nirvīpsena tadā nirdiṣṭaṃ jātyandhapuraṃ nirvīpsenaiva yadā pratyavamṛśyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:343: tataś cātrānuguṇaparāmarśān na doṣaḥ kaś cit /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:344: tathā yatra pūrvavākye yacchabdo nirdiṣṭa uttaravākye tu na tacchabdo nirdiṣṭaḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:346: mīlitaṃ yad abhirāmatādhike sādhu candramasi puṣkaraiḥ kṛtam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:347: iti / uttaravākyagatatvena tu yacchabdaprayoge pūrvavākye tacchabdaprayoge na duṣṭatvam,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:348: api tu prākpratipāditaṃ puṣṭatvam eva sāmānyenopakramāt paścād viśeṣasyotthāpanāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:350: udāharaṇaṃ tu sādhu candramasi puṣkaraiḥ kṛtaṃ mīlitaṃ yadabhirāmatādhike iti pūrvaślokārdhapāṭhaviparyaye yathā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:351: yattacchabdayor aviśiṣṭe 'pi parāmarśakatve uttaravākye nirdiṣṭo yacchabdaḥ svabhāvata āvidūryeṇa pūrvavākyārthāśliṣṭatayā vastu parāmṛśati,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:353: āvidūryaṃ ca prakṛtārthaṃ prakṛṣṭatāṃ nayad vākyārthaṃ śleṣayati /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:354: tataś ca tathābhūte viṣaye yacchabdasya prayogārhatve tacchabdasya prayogo 'puṣṭa eva.
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:355: tasyāḥ śalākāñjananirmiteva kāntir bhruvor ānatarekhayor yā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:356: tāṃ vīkṣya līlācaturām anaṅgaḥ svacāpasaundaryam adaṃ mumoca //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:357: atra sā yāṃ vīkṣyeti yattadau viparyayeṇa paṭhanīyau / yathā ca:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:358: dṛṣṭir nāmṛtavarṣiṇī smitamadhuprasyandi vaktraṃ na kiṃ nārdrārdraṃ hṛdayaṃ na candanarasasparśāni vāṅgāni ca /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:359: kasmin labdhapadena te kṛtam idaṃ krūreṇa dagdhāgninā nūnaṃ vajramayo 'nya eva dahanas tasyedam āceṣṭitam //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:361: ācāryo me sa khalu bhagavān asmadgrāhyanāmā tasmād eṣā dhanur upaniṣat tatprasādāt kṣamo 'pi /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:362: adhyāsīnaḥ katham aham aho vartma vaikhānasānāṃ sītāpāṇigrahaṇapaṇitaṃ cāpam āropayāmi //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:363: atra ca yasmād eṣā dhanur upaniṣad iti paṭhanīyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:364: evaṃ ca prāg ukte hemno bhārataśatānītyādau tā bāṇena tu tasya sūktivisarair uṭṭaṅkitāḥ kīrtayo yāḥ kalpapralaye 'pi yānti na manāṅ manye parimlānatām iti paṭhanīyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:365: api ca parāmṛśyam anuktvā yacchabdena ca vākyārthopakrame tacchabdavati parāmṛśyanirdeśe
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:366: pūrvavākyārthe parāmṛśyam aspṛśantī upaplavamānā pratītir iti vākyārthapratipattiviprakarṣād apuṣṭatvam / yathā:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:368: svasthād evāvamānena dehinas tad varaṃ rajaḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:369: ata evātra ślokārdhayor viparyayapāṭhe puṣṭatvam eva /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:370: tathā pūrvavākyārthe nirdiṣṭasyārthasyottaravākyārthe sarvanāmamātreṇa parāmarśe nyāyye yaḥ svaśabdasahitasya sarvanāmno nirdeśaḥ sa duṣṭa eva / yathā:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:371: udanvacchinnā bhūḥ sa ca nidhir apāṃ yojanaśataṃ sadā pānthaḥ pūṣā gaganaparimāṇaṃ kalayati /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:372: iti prāyo bhāvaḥ sphuradavadhimudrāmukulitaḥ satāṃ prajñonmeṣaḥ punar ayam asīmā vijayate //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:373: iti / atra sa ca nidhir apām iti sasvaśabdaḥ sarvanāmno nirdeśaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:374: evaṃ rāmagiryāśrameṣv iti prakṛte tasminn adrau kati cid ity atra jñeyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:375: atra tu ke cit samarthayante - rāmagiryāśrameṣv iti rāmagiriḥ samāsa upasarjanībhūto
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:376: buddhāv udrekeṇānavabhāsāt kathaṃ sarvanāmnā parāmṛśyate sarvanāmnānusandhir vṛtticchannasyeti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:379: atrādrāv iti nirdiśyamānam adrimātrapratīter na prakṛtam adriṃ gamayet /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:380: tasmād ubhayam atropādeyaṃ yathā atha śabdnānuśāsanam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:382: giriśabdena girau prakrānta adriśabdena paryāyāntareṇa tv āgatam āsamañjasyaṃ duṣpariharam eveti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:383: udanvacchinnā bhūr ity atra tu udanvataḥ parāmṛśyasya naikaṭhyād yogyatvāc ca bhuvaḥ strītvena sa iti parāmarśānarhatvāc ca sarvanāmaparāmarśa eva yukto,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:384: na punaḥ svaśabdagocaratvam ity atra duṣṭataiva /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:385: kiṃ ca samudāyasya kasya cit kena cid vākyena nirdeśe vākyāntare tadavayavasya nirdhāreṇa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:386: karttavye tasya samudāyasaya nirdhāraṇaviṣayapratītaye yacchabdena nirdeśe karttavye
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:388: tasmād ajāyata manur navarājabījaṃ yasyānvaye sa sagaraḥ sa bhagīrathaś ca /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:389: ekena yena jaladhiḥ parikhānito 'yam anyena siddhasaritā paripūritaś ca //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:390: atra sa sagaraḥ sa bhagīrathaś ceti yan nirdiṣṭaṃ tasyaiketyādinā nirdhāraṇaṃ vihitam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:391: nirdhāraṇaṃ ca jātiguṇakriyābhiḥ samudāyād ekadeśasya pṛthak karaṇam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:392: na cātra samudāyaḥ kena cit padena nirdiṣṭaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:396: tataś ca nirdeśyānirdeśād anirdeśyanirdeśyāc cātra duṣṭatvam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:397: evaṃ ca samudāyasyaiva nirdhāraṇaviṣayasya yacchabdena nirdeśe karttavye eko yayor jalanidhīn nicakhāna sapta gāṅgaiḥ payobhir abhivarṣitavān dvitīyaḥ iti pāṭhaḥ śreyān /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:398: kva cid yattacchabdāv agrahaṇena vidhyanuvādabhāvena vākyārthaprastāve yadantarānyathākaraṇaṃ tatra duṣṭatvaṃ yathā:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:399: yat tvannetrasamānakānti salile magnaṃ tad indīvaram
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:400: iti / atra prathamatṛtīyayoḥ pādayor yattacchabdaparigraheṇa vidhyanuvādabhāvenopanibandhaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:402: indīvarāṇāṃ rājahaṃsānāṃ ca bahutvāt sītāsaṃbandhivastūpamitayor indīvararājahaṃsayor vyāvṛttyarthaṃ vidhyanuvādabhāvaparigrahaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:403: candrasya tv ekatvāt tadakaraṇam iti ke cit /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:405: candrasyāpi dvitīyācandrādibhedena bahutvasaṃbhavāt tatrāpi vidhyanuvādabhāvo yuktaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:407: candrasya punar ekavyaktirūpasya kālabhedād avasthābhedāc ca bhinnatvam amukhyam iti cen na /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:410: ataś caiva dvitīyācandrādivyāvṛttyā pūrṇacandrapratītyarthaṃ mukhacchāyānukārīti viśeṣaṇaṃ dattam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:414: kva cij jātivyavahāreṣv apīndīvarādīnām ekatvaṃ siddham /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:415: tasmāt kavivyavahāre candragatatvenānekatvasya vyavahārāt tadāśrayeṇeha vidhyanuvādabhāvaḥ śreyān /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:417: masṛṇacaraṇapātaṃ gamyatāṃ bhūḥ sadarbhā viracaya sicayāntaṃ mūrdhni gharmaḥ kaṭhoraḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:418: iti / atra viracaya sicayāntam ity atra tacchabdo hetvartho viniveśayitavyas tṛtīyapādādau niveśitaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:421: kva cit pradhānakriyāyās tadādisarvanāmnā parāmṛṣṭasya guṇakriyāyāṃ svaśabdenopādānaṃ duṣṭam eva /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:423: atra tasmai iti sarvanāmnā pūrvaprakrānto meghaḥ parāmṛśyata utaitacchlokagato jīmūtaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:424: tatrādye pakṣe jīmūtagrahaṇam anarthakaṃ pradhānakriyāyāṃ tadā parāmṛṣṭasya pūrvaprakrāntasyaiva meghasyārthataḥ saṃbandhayogyatvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:425: na hi yāvatāṃ yena saṃbandhas tāvatāṃ pratyekaṃ nirdeśaḥ kriyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:428: kṛtaṃ pratyuta vastvantarapratītiṃ janayad vairasyam āvahati /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:431: sarvatrātra prakaraṇe pūrvaprakrāntasyaiva meghasya parāmarśaḥ sthita itīhāpi tathaiva parāmarśo nyāyya iti punar api jīmūtagrayaṇam anarthakam eva /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:432: itthaṃ dvitīyaṃ vidheyāvimarśaṃ vivicya tṛtīyam apy atraiva śloke prapañcayitum upakramate - api cetyādinā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:433: prāyeṇeti dvandvaṃ varjayitvā tatra yugapadadhukaraṇavacanatayā sāmarthyaṃ prakārāntareṇa samarthitam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:434: tatrādya iti tatpuruṣaḥ samānādhikaraṇaḥ karmadhārayaḥ iti vacanāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:435: bahuvrīhiḥ samānādhikaraṇānām iti vacanāt prāyeṇa bahuvrīhiḥ samānādhikaraṇaviṣaya eva /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:438: yadā saṅkhyāyā iti vyadhikaraṇa saṅkhyāpūrvo dviguḥ iti vacanāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:441: kārakāṇām iti kartṛkaraṇe kṛtā bahulam ityādinā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:445: vidheyadhurām iti śabdavṛtte yo vidheyaḥ tasya kakṣyāṃ vāstavīṃ vidheyatām ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:447: śābdaṃ prādhānyam anapekṣya vāstavena prādhānyenety arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:448: astam iyād iti ekārthībhāvād vibhaktatvenāpratīter ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:456: atra phalabheda ity atra prakrāntaṃ phalaṃ saṃbandhanīyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:459: tarhi na hi sahānavasthānalakṣaṇo vastugata eka eva virodhaḥ bhedo,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:461: kiṃ tarhi parasparaparihārasthitatālakṣaṇo vastvavastutvāśrayo dvitīyo 'py asti virodhaprakāraḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:462: tadā hi yadi vastvāśrayo na saṃbhavati virodho vastvavastutvāśrayas tu kathaṃ na syād /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:463: ataś ca syāt pūrvapakṣavelāyāṃ bhāvābhāvayor evety uktam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:467: tasyām eva kakṣyāyāṃ svayam aprādhānyaṃ na syād,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:469: prādhānyavidheye punar apekṣāntareṇāprādhānyaṃ kathaṃ na syāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:470: na syād, yadi śītoṣṇavad dvayor vastutvaṃ syāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:472: yathā rājapuruṣa ity atra rājño vaivakṣikam eva prādhānyaṃ vāstavaṃ punar aprādhānyam eva tadvad atrāpi draṣṭavyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:473: tad ayam atra piṇḍārthaḥ saṃsarganiṣedho 'tra kartavyaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:474: sa ca vastudvayaniṣṭha iti dvayor atrābhāvān naikenāparatra pratiṣedha iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:477: parasparaviśeṣaṇānāṃ yady api viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyeṇa iti viśeṣaṇasya viśeṣyeṇaiva samāsa uktaḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:478: tathāpi kāṇakhañjādiṣu siddhaṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayor yatheṣṭatvād iti vacanenaikasya viśeṣyatvavivakṣām āśritya parasparaṃ viśeṣaṇānāṃ samāsaḥ samarthitaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:480: dārasukha iti dārāṇāṃ sukheti tatpuruṣaḥ kartavyaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:481: bahuvrīhau rājāhassakhibhyaḥ iti ṭac na syāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:483: mṛtasya śiśor dvijasya ity atra samāsaḥ śaṅkitaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:484: rāmasya pāṇir asi iti tu ṣaṣṭhīsamāsa udāharaṇam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:485: atra kva cit kartṝṇām karmaṇāṃ ca prathamāntānāṃ kvāpi saṃbandhināṃ karmaṇāṃ ca ṣaṣṭhyantānāṃ kutrāpy āmantraṇānāṃ samāsaḥ śaṅkitaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:495: atra yathā ca kāraṇaguṇe ityādigranthaḥ antaraślokaparyantaḥ pratyudāharaṇaṃ yathā taṃ kṛpāmṛdur ity ataḥ pūrvaṃ paṭhitaḥ sāmañjasyaṃ bhajate,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:496: pratyudāharaṇaṃ ceti udāharaṇagranthaḥ samañjasa eva syāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:500: tadabhāve hetur iti tacchabdena samāsaḥ parāmṛṣṭaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:501: tataś cātra pārāśaryādipadaṃ vyāsādāv utkarṣam arpayat punar uktam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:502: takṣakasarpa iti takṣakaśabdenaivātra sarpaviśeṣatvāt sarpatve pratīte sarpapadam utkarṣasamarpaṇapravaṇam eveti tadarthasya vidheyatvam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:503: lohitas takṣaka iti yathā takṣakaśabdād eva sarpatvajātiḥ pratītā tadval lohitalakṣaṇo guṇo 'pi tata evāvyabhicārāt pratītaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:504: tatas tau jātiguṇau vidheyatābhiprāyeṇoktau na samāsa nyagbhāvanīyau /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:505: uktanyāyād iti vidheyatvān na samāsaḥ pravartata ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:506: pakṣo na cāsty anyas tadatyaye iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:507: iha dvau pakṣāv ullikhitau takṣakasya svarūpamātrapratipādanaṃ vā lohitākhyaguṇavidhir vā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:509: tadatyaye ca kathitapakṣadvayātikrame cānyas tṛtīyapakṣo nāstīty arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:510: evam iyatā karmadhārayaṃ vicārya bahuvrīhinirūpaṇāyāha bahuvrīhau yatheti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:511: tatas tad iti sthalīkaraṇādi yad viśeṣaṇatayopāttaṃ tat parāmṛśyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:517: antyāvasthā prāptakāraṇeṣu yuktaiva kāryotpattir ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:521: ardhajaratīyam iti ardhaṃ jaratyā iti samāsāc ca tadviṣayā iti cchapratyayaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:522: yathā jaratyā varāṅgaṃ kāmayate mukhaṃ na kāmayate tadvad evety arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:523: tat tasya iti tad iti tasmāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:527: ata eva sūryācandramasāv iti dvandvanirdeśo dvayoḥ spardhitāṃ prakāśayati /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:528: urvaśyā ca bhuvā ceti samāsābhāvo varaṇasya mukhyāmukhyatvapradarśanārtham ekasya vāstavatvād aparasya kaviprauḍhoktiniṣpāditatvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:529: iha ceti pratītivaicitryaṃ spaṣṭataram eva dhārayatu matimān iti pāścātya sanbandhanāyaṃ janaka iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:531: evaṃ bahuvrīhiṃ vicārya dviguṃ vyācaṣṭe dvigau yatheti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:532: niravaśeṣa iti saptatvasaṅkhyāyāṃ vidheyatvena saṃrambhāspadatvaṃ samāse tu nyagbhāvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:533: daśasv iti daśatvasaṅkhyāyā vidheyatvaṃ rāvaṇasya paribhavātiśayaṃ prakāśayati ekasminn api mūrdhani padanyāsaḥ paribhavāspadaṃ kiṃ punar daśāsv iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:534: pratyudāharaṇaṃ saptāṅgyām iha yasya sa itītyādipāṭhe /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:536: evaṃ dviguṃ vyākhyāya nañsamāsaṃ vyācaṣṭe nañsamāseti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:537: upadarśitam iti asaṃrabdhavān ity atra vidheyāvimarśavicāre anuktavān iti noktavān iti vācyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:538: tatpuruṣe kartrādīnāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ kārakāṇāṃ saṃbandhasya ca krameṇodāharaṇāny āha deśetyādinā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:541: ahitasaṃbandhināṃ śastrāṇāṃ ghasmarāṇi grasanaśīlāni ata eva gurūṇi /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:550: satyam kiṃ tu nañprayogaviṣaye ekaśabdasyaikavyatiriktavastuviṣayatvaṃ yathā abrāhmaṇa ity atra brāhmaṇaśabdasya kṣatriyādigocaratvam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:551: ekavyatiriktaṃ ca vastu kadā cid ekatvoparaktaṃ pratīyate,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:553: ādye pakṣe anekam iti bhavati dvitīye tv anekānīti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:554: yathā ca padamañjariḥ patañjaliḥ - pravṛttibhede prayojakaṃ cittam ekam anekeṣām iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:555: gurudattam iti guruṇā dattam iti vācyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:556: tat tasyā iti sītāyā viśeṣaṇabhūtāyāḥ sītākartṛtkāyā gamanakriyāyā ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:557: gurvartham iti gurave idaṃ gurvartham iti kriyāviśeṣaṇam etat /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:561: tat tasyeti tad gurvartham iti viśeṣaṇam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:567: pradakṣiṇakriyety atra pradakṣiṇakriyāyā atyayakriyākarmabhūtāyā antarāyahetukopanimittatvāt prādhānyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:572: svahastalikhitānīti svahastaśabdo 'trādarapratītihetukatvena lekhanaṃ praty utkarṣanimittam api samāse guṇīkṛtaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:575: pitāmahapitāmatayeti pitāmaho brahmā pitāmahaḥ pūrvapuruṣo yasya /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:579: kṭāntād adhikam āsamudrāt kṣitīśānām iti ca vācyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:580: apādānasamānanyāyatvād avadhir api pañcamyanto 'tra gṛhyata iti pratyudāharaṇopapattiḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:586: tasyāḥ saṃbandhidvāreṇa saṃbandhitvamukhena kapālina iti viśeṣaṇam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:595: tasya sakaleti tacchabdaḥ kapālina ity asya parāmarśakaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:601: taveti cety eṣāṃ viśeṇaṇānām utkarṣasamarpakatvaṃ jñeyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:608: mātreti evaṃ kṛtam ity atra karaṇam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:611: tathā ca ṣaṣṭhyā ākrośe iti jñāpakam rūpakam upadeśa iṣyata iti pramāṇāntareṇa loko
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:612: vedas tathādhyātmaṃ pramāṇaṃ trividham ity uktarūpeṇa siddhau yau svasya viśeṣaṇasyotkarṣāpakarṣau
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:615: alukam āha ṣaṣṭhyā ākrośe ity anena /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:619: iha hi vibhaktiśravaṇāśravaṇe vā anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ viśeṣaṇagatayor vāstavayoḥ prayojakatāṃ bhajete /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:620: te tu prāyeṇa vākyasamāsagatatvenopalabhyamāne samāsasya vibhaktyaśravaṇād vidheyāvimarśatām utpādayataḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:621: ata eva samāse 'pi yadi vibhaktiḥ śrūyate,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:622: tadā na vidheyāvimarśo yathā dāsyāḥ kāmuka ityādau /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:625: evaṃ ca vibhaktyaśravaṇānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyitvaṃ vidheyāvimarśasya vyāptyā pradarśitaṃ bhavati /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:626: evaṃ ca saptaprakāraṃ tatpuruṣaṃ nirūpyāvyayībhāvaṃ nirūpayati - avyayībhāva iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:627: samāpaṃ viśeṣyaṃ prati dayitasyeti yad viśeṣaṇaṃ tat tasya samīpasyeti yojanā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:628: madhyevyometi pāre madhye ṣaṣṭhyā vā ity avyayībhāvaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:633: sarvaṃ kaṣatīti sarvakūlābhrakarīreṣu kaṣaḥ iti khaco 'yaṃ viṣayaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:634: bibhartti yaḥ iti kukṣiṃbhariś ca iti nipātitasya kukṣimbhariśabdasyāyaṃ gocaraḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:635: vidhun tud iti vidhvaruṣos tud iti khaśpratyayasthānam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:636: śīrṣacchedam iti śīrṣacchedād yac ca iti taddhitasya yat pratyayasyedaṃ padam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:640: vidhoś ceti vyakta sthitaḥ utkarṣam ādadhatāṃ prādhānyena vivakṣety atra sāmastyena yojanīyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:641: śīrṣacchedasya ceti utkarṣam ādadhataḥ prādhānyena vivakṣeti saṃbandhanīyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:643: atra ca sarvārthādīnāṃ caturṇām utkarṣādhāne samanantaranirdiṣṭa bhuvanābhayetyādicatuṣṭayaṃ krameṇa hetutvena draṣṭavyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:648: daśarathasya hi prasūtir asāv iti tasyāpatyam iti stracpratyaye taddhite kṛte dāśarathiśabdasyāyaṃ gocaraḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:649: vākye tu yady apīti tad uktam - kriyāpradhānaṃ guṇavad ekārthaṃ vākyam iṣyate iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:651: sa iti pradhānabhāvenety atra nirdiṣṭaḥ pradhānabhāvaḥ śabdārthasāmarthyavivakṣākṛtānāṃ trayāṇām apīti śabdakṛtaṃ śabdasaṃskāramahimnā niṣpannaṃ yathā karmadhārayād uttarapadasya /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:652: arthasāmarthyakṛtaṃ vastuvṛttaniṣpāditaṃ yathā grahaṃ saṃmārṣṭītyādau grahādeḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:654: vivakṣākṛtaṃ prayoktṛyadṛcchāpratipāditaṃ yad anyasyotkarṣāpakarṣādhānatayā vivakṣitaṃ yathā rāmasya pāṇir asi ityādau rāmādeḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:655: tatra triṣu prādhānyeṣu vivakṣākṛtam eva grādhānyaṃ pradhānam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:658: tayor iti śabdārthasāmarthyakṛtayoḥ vivakṣākṛtena sahety arthāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:659: nanu pūrvaṃ śābdasyaiva prādhānyasya vaivakṣikatvam uktam anyasya tu vāstavatvam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:660: tat katham iha śābdavaivakṣikayor anyatvam ucyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:667: anyasya tu kavigocarasya vāstavatvaṃ tad evārthatvam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:668: iha punaḥ sahṛdayaikagocarasya kavivivakṣāvaśād vaivakṣikatvam ucyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:669: śābdikaikaviṣayasya śābdatvam ity apekṣābhedāt pūrvas tāvan na virodhaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:670: yad api prādhānyatrayapratipādane 'rthasāmarthyavivakṣākṛtayor bheda uktas tatrāyaṃ bhāvaḥ - iha śābdaṃ vāstavaṃ ceti dvividham eva prādhānyam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:672: saty api śabdakṛtād anyatva utkarṣāpakarṣapratipādanaprayuktakavivivakṣākṛtatve vāstavam eva vivakṣākṛta pratipāditam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:673: tathā ca grahaṃ saṃmārṣṭīti vaidikaṃ vivakṣānapekṣam arthasāmarthyakṛtasyodāharaṇaṃ dattam iti viṣayavibhāgavyavasthiter na dvitīyo 'pi virodha iti samañjasaṃ sarvam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:674: evaṃ kṛttaddhitavṛttiviṣaye ātideśikaṃ guṇapradhānabhāvaṃ vicārya samāsagatatvenaupadeśikaṃ prakṛtam anusandhatte tad idam atreti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:675: sarūpāṇām iti dvandvasamāsasamānanyāyatvād ekaśeṣavṛttir api svīkṛtā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:677: rūpaṃ ca kāntiś ca vidagdhatā ceti,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:679: rūpam ityādau hi gamyamānabhavanakriyāpekṣaṃ rūpādīnāṃ kartṛtvam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:680: etena tatpuruṣasya kartrudāharaṇaprastāve kartrādīnāṃ kārakāṇām anekeṣām iti yad uktaṃ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:681: tat samīhitam. kaś ca kaś ceti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:684: adhunā pradhānetarabhāvāpattiṃ darśayati yatra punar iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:689: tadartham eveti upamotprekṣādayo 'py alaṅkārāḥ upamotprekṣādīnām utkarṣam apakarṣaṃ vā pratipādayituṃ vidhīyante /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:693: samāsa iti sā samāsa iti vivakṣā parāmṛśyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:694: vaidarbhīti yady api vāmanamate asamāsā pāñcālī,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:696: tathāpi matāntare viparyayaḥ sthita iti tadabhiprāyeṇehāsamāsā vaidarbhī kathitā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:699: atra caturthapādaikaśeṣadeśayuktasya pādatrayasya samāse saṃbandhamātraṃ pratīyate,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:701: vākyāt tūbhayam iti ubhayaṃ saṃbandharūpam utkarṣāpakarṣarūpaṃ ca vastv ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:702: atrodāharaṇaṃ me yadaraya iti samāse hi madaraya iti syāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:704: nanu padād uttarapadayor yuṣmadasmadoḥ temayāv ekavacanasya iti temayāv ādeśāv uktau /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:707: tatprayoge nacavāhāhaivayukte iti niṣedhād bhinnavākyagatatvāc ca /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:710: utkarṣamātram eva śabdādeśaḥ atra ke cid āhuḥ vākye tāvad rasapratītir nirvyūḍhā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:711: tām anupamaradayan kāvye yady asādhuśabdo 'pi syān na tadā sthūlaḥ kaś cid doṣaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:715: nīrasas tu prabandho yaḥ so 'paśabdo mahān kaveḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:720: tenātra temeśabdau nipāteṣv iti tādṛśo vibhaktipratirūpako meśabdo nipāto,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:722: tataś ca nātra kaś cid viśeṣa iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:732: nyūneti padyāpekṣayā nyūnaṃ rasābhivyaktihetutvam ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:734: samāso 'rdhāntāvadhiḥ kāryo nādhika ity anena vyāvartyasyādhikasya tad udāharaṇam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:735: tasyeti padārthānāṃ parasparasaṃbandhaś cen na cchidyate tadā tasya samāsasya madhye vicchedo na kārya ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:738: atra pānādīnām prakāśanasya ca vidhyanuvādalopitvaikakartṛkāṇāṃ prādhānyabhāvo nāpasmṛtam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:739: atra ca yo 'yam iti yacchabdena dīpasya padārthasya parāmarśopakrame tattamasa iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:740: tacchabdena vākyārthasya parāmarśo duṣṭa ity upapāditaṃ prāk /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:745: candrasya suvarṇasya saṃbandhī kāntāvabhāso lasan dedīpyamāno yasmin /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:746: candrakāṇāṃ mecakānām avabhāso lasanaṃ sphurad yasya /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:749: apara iveti atrāparaśabdasāmarthyād bhūpe dvitīyaguhatvapratītau vastutas tadasaṃbhave tatsaṃbhāvanāyām utprekṣā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:750: aparaśabdābhāve tu svasvarūpasthitasyaiva vāstavasya guhasya pratītāv iyam upamā syāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:757: karttā hi guṇakriyā niṣpādayan pradhānakriyām aidamparyeṇa niṣpādayati,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:759: yatra sarvāsv aidamparyaṃ tatra bhavaty eva sarvāsām ākhyātavācyatvam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:764: bahulagrahaṇam iti viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyeṇa bahulam ity atra /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:766: kva cit pravṛttiḥ kva cid apravṛttir iti bahulagrahaṇaprayojanasya vyavasthitatvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:767: utargeti samāsavidhiḥ sāmānyarūpatvād utsargaḥ prādhānyādivivakṣānimittaś ca tatpratiṣedho viśeṣarūpatvād apavādaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:772: yathā utsargasya ghañy amanuṣye bahulam ity atra /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:776: tadviṣayaḥ syād iti kṛtyalyuṭo bahulam ityādigatasya bahulagrahaṇasya vidhyanuvādabhāvaviṣaye sāmarthyābhāvāt samāsābhāva iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:782: tasyehārthatvam apīti samarthagrahaṇaṃ pradhānetarabhāvaviṣayanivṛttyartham apīty arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:787: anabhidhānaṃ veti abhidhānalakṣaṇā hi kṛttaddhitasmāsā iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:791: dṛṣṭir nāmṛtavarṣiṇī smitamadhuprasyandi vaktraṃ na tan nārdrārdraṃ hṛdayaṃ na candanarasasparśāni cāṅgāni vā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:794: khaṇḍiketi khaṇḍo granthasaṃbandhī na tu samasto granthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:796: anavagatatadabhiprāyair iti samarthagrahaṇaṃ praty ācāryasya hi tair abhiprāyo nāgataḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:805: yatrārthaprakaraṇādinā śabdasya vācyo 'rthaḥ prakarṣāpakarṣādikam arthāntaraṃ prakāśayati,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:808: prakaraṇaśabdādisakha iti pāṭhe śabdasyānyasya sannidhir iti svīkṛtam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:810: tadā kākugrahaṇena svaraviśeṣa ucyate yaḥ kālo vyaktisvarādayaḥ iti kāvyagatatvena svīkṛtaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:812: guṇapradhānabhāvavivakṣāṃ mahatā prapañcena parighaṭayya prakṛtodāraṇe ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣagatatvena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:833: sarasvatyā ambikā pratibimbam ātmanaś ca kesarīty arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:836: samāsād asāv iti ambikākesariśabdād unmiṣaty eva sa camatkāra ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:838: vṛttau camatkārasyāstamaya vākye udaya iti cūlikākrameṇa yogaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:841: sā codanārhā iṣṭam etan na sidhyatīti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:845: sā bhrāntir eveti nirvikalpavikalpabhedena dvividhā bhrāntiḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:851: tatrāropiteti tatra samāse śuktisthānīye rajatam ivāropitāvāstavīty arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:855: yo 'sāv ity adaḥśabdaḥ prasiddhiparāmarśakaḥ yacchabdapratinirdeśasya tacchabdena kariṣyamāṇatvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:857: ārtho hi kevalatacchabdasya prayoganibandhana upakramopasaṃhārakramaḥ pratipādita eva /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:865: so 'pahnavaḥ kva cid garbhīkṛto yathā nakhakṣatānīva vanasthalīnām ity atra,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:868: kva cit tu śabdena pratipādyate yathā adhyāruroheveti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:872: tatra hi vidhyanuvādabhāva āñjasyena krameṇa pratīyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:880: pitroḥ svateveti yathā pitarau vandanīyāv iti nityasaṃbandhanyāyād nijāv eva pitarau pratīyete,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:881: tadvat sāpekṣāṇām anabhidhānākhyena nyāyena samāsābhāvaḥ pratyeṣyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:884: adhunā svotkarṣaśālitāprakaṭanārthaṃ svapariśramaṃ piṇḍīkṛtya ślokena darśayitum āha kāvyakāñcaneti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:885: kāvyam eva parīkṣaṇīyatvāt suvarṇaṃ tatra parīkṣāsthānaṃ nikaṣopalam ātmānaṃ manyate,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:886: na punar uktakrameṇa parāmarthas san nikaṣopalaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:889: yaḥ sarvasāratayā pradarśitas tatreyatī dūṣaṇavṛṣṭir muktā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:892: atra śloke vakṣyamāṇaitadīyanyāyānusāreṇa kaṣeṇa niyamena kāñcanākṣepāt kāñcanapadaṃ paunaruktyadoṣaduṣṭam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:893: nijakāvyalakṣmaṇīty atra nijārthasya saṃrambhāspadatvena vidheyatvāt samāsakaraṇaṃ vidheyāvimarśadūṣitaṃ ke cid ācakṣate vicakṣaṇāḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:894: tattvenaiva granthakṛtā svakṛtiṣv ayantrita ityādinā dattottaram eva /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:896: sāhityamīmāṃsāyāṃ ca teṣu teṣu sthāneṣu prapañcaḥ pradarśita iti granthavistarabhayād ita evoparamyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:897: evaṃ vidheyāvimarśaṃ prakāravaicitryeṇa lakṣayitvā prakramabhedaṃ lakṣayitum āha - prakramabhedo 'pīti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:909: tadā jāyante guṇā yadā tais sahṛdayair gṛhyante /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:911: evam eva janas tasyā dadāti kapolopamāyāṃ śaśibimbam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:912: paramārthavicāre punaś candraś candra iva varākaḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:918: candraśabdārthasya śaśiśabdena paryāyāntaranirdeśo na yukto vakṣyamāṇaprakramabhedaprasaṅgāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:919: na caivam iti tenaiva śabdenopasaṃhāra ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:922: tatra hi yathoddeśaṃ pratinirdeśe na paunaruktyam,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:925: kṣāmāṅgyaḥ kṣatakomalāṅguligaladraktaiḥ sadarbhāḥ sthalīḥ pādaiḥ pātitayāvakair iva galadbāṣpāmbudhautānanāḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:926: iti / atra galacchabdadvayaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ yathoddeśaṃ pratinirdeśo 'sya viṣaya iti samañjasam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:930: vajasīty atra vrajinā prakrame vajinā ca nirvāhe kathaṃ na prakramabhedaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:932: vaja vraja gatāv iti pāṭhād ity āśaṅkyoktaṃ vrajata iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:933: uditaṃ śiśuneti uditam ity asya viśeṣaṇaṃ paricayagatārtham iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:936: kāryārthaṃ pathi gacchataḥ paścān nāmodīraṇaṃ viruddham iti śiśunā lalitavacasā nāmany udīrite jananyāsya bhartsanaṃ kṛtam iti tato 'sya manyur vivṛddha ity atra tātparyārthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:937: evaṃ dhāturūpāyāḥ prkṛte prakramabhedaṃ pradarśya saṃprati prātipadikarūpāyās tasyā madhye ca sarvanāmādīnāṃ prakāravaicitryeṇa taṃ darśayati sarvanāmeti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:938: kva cit punaḥ pustakeṣu prakṛtiprakramabhedād anantaraṃ pratyayaprakramabhedodāharaṇaṃ tat paścāt sarvanāmaprakramabhedanirdeśo dṛśyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:939: tatra ca prkṛter anantaraṃ pratyayasyaiva nirdeśa ucita iti sa eva kathita iti saṅgatiḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:940: tataḥ paraṃ prakṛtiviśeṣāṇāṃ pratyayaviśeṣāṇāṃ tatsamudāyānāṃ ca tatprakramabhedo nirūpayiṣyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:942: yas tv ekavākye kartṛtvenokto yaś cedamādibhir ity atroktena krameṇety arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:943: nanu yacchabdena prakrame tacchabdenedamādibhir vā prakrame yacchabdena vā katham upasaṃhāra ity āha na caivam iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:946: evaṃ tacchabdādūraviprakṛṣṭārtheṣv idamādiṣu prāg ukte yo 'vikalpam ityādau jñeyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:949: atra hīti atra hi kartṛviśeṣaṇadvāreṇaikasya hetutvam aparasya sākṣād iti prakramabhedaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:950: yaśodhigantum iti atra hi tṛtīyātumunoḥ pratītivaiṣamyajanakatvam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:952: vakṣyati hi tulyakakṣyatayā yatra padārthāḥ iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:954: atra ke cit samarthayante - viśeṣataḥ snihyanto dṛśyante tat putraśabdasyāpatyaviśeṣavācitve
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:955: apatyaśabdasya ca sāmānyavācitve 'pi sarvanāmavaśād viśeṣaparyavasāne bhavaty eva
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:957: tad etad asya granthakārasya hṛdayam anālokyaiva,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:959: tatra ca dvayor bimbapratibimbabhāvena nirdeśo yujyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:967: sthitapāṭhe putraśabdasya viśeṣavācitvam apatyaśabdasya sāmānyavācino viśeṣaparyavasānam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:968: yadā tv apatyavato 'pīti pāṭhas tadāsya sāmānyopakramo viśeṣopasaṃhāraḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:969: dvitīyasyāpatyaśabdasya sarvanāmasaṃbandhena viśeṣaparyavasānād yathaikīyamate tasminn adrau kati cid balety atra /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:971: yasya naivāpatyasaṃbandhas tasya mā bhūt kanyāyām ekasyām atṛptiḥ yasya tv anekāpatyayogas tasya katham ekasminn apatye snigdhatvam iti vismayaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:976: tad ittham apatyavato 'pīty eṣa eva pāṭhaḥ śreyān /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:977: samāsānupapattīti adhikaṃ na tu taddhānir iti nyāyena guṇāntaralābha ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:979: kṛtāḥ śikṣitāḥ santo dhvastā naṣṭā guṇā yasya /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:984: haṃsaś candra iva candra iva haṃsa iti yuktaḥ pāṭhaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:990: samuccayasya tv idaṃ vīryaṃ cety udāharaṇam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:991: vidvatsu vīryaṃ tanaye iti pāṭhe na vedanaṃ hetutvena vivakṣitam,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:993: evaṃ ca vidvatsv iti viśeṣaṇasya nairarthakyam āpadyata iti nānena vicāritam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:995: sāmānādhikaraṇyenopakrame vaiyadhikaraṇyena pratinirdeśaḥ prakramabhedāvahaḥ atra caturthe pāde /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:996: kapālam evāmalaśekharaśrīr ity atra kapālānāṃ bahutve vācye yad ekatvavacanam amalaśekharaśrīr
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:997: ity atra ca śekharamātre dharmiṇi vaktavye yacchekharaśrīr iti dharmavacanaṃ tad
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:999: evaṃ ca pūrvokteṣu vakṣyamāṇeṣu codāharaṇeṣu saṃbhavann api vicāro granthavistarabhayān na niravaśeṣatayā kṛta iti tatraivābhiyogaḥ kartavyaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1001: svaśabdena sarvanāmnā vā nirdeśas tulyaphala iti pratipādayiṣyamāṇatvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1003: anena nyāyena paśyata mātaḥ iti vārttike dharmakīrteḥ prayogaḥ pratyuktaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1009: nejanādāv iti liṭā bhūtānadyatanaparokṣaprakrame anenijur iti tu bhūtānadyatanena nirvāhaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1010: tathā dhṛtavikāsīty atra bhūtamātre ktapratyaya ity atrāpi kālaprakramabhedaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1013: anenijur iti atra vikacam asya dadhuḥ prasūnam iti samādhānaṃ na kṛtaṃ prakārāntareṇa samarthayiṣyamāṇatvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1015: ajayad iti atra parokṣo 'pi jayo darśanārhatvāt parokṣatvena na vivakṣita iti liṭprayogo na kṛtaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1017: na hi kasyāś cit kanyāyā udarābhāvaḥ kṛśatvāt punas tad api vivakṣyate / evaṃ ca -
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1018: abhūdabhūmiḥ pratipakṣajanmanāṃ bhiyāṃ tanūjas tapanadyutir diteḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1019: yam indraśabdārthaniṣūdanaṃ harer hariṇyapūrvaṃ kaśipuṃ pracakṣate // ityādeḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1020: tāta tvaṃ nijatejasaiva gamitaḥ svargaṃ yadi svasti te kiṃ tv anyena hṛtā vadhūr iti kathāṃ mā sakhyur agre kṛthāḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1021: rāmo 'haṃ yadi rāghavas tad akhilaṃ vrīḷānamatkandharaṃ sārdhaṃ bandhujanena sendravijayī vaktā svayaṃ rāvaṇaḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1022: ityādeś ca mahataḥ kāvyapravāhasya na kiṃ cid duṣṭatvam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1028: yathā bhūtasya bhāvinaś ca kālasyādyatanānadyatanatve parokṣāparokṣatve ca vaivakṣike eveti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1029: te śīlādayo 'rthāḥ ā kves tacchīlataddharmatatsādhukāriṣu ity atra nirdiṣṭāḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1031: evaṃ ca kva cit tācchīlikādipratyayaprayoge 'py anyatra tadakaraṇam aduṣṭam / yathā -
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1033: agṛdhnur ādade so 'rtham asaktaḥ sukham anvabhūt //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1034: ity atrāgṛdhnur iti tācchīlyādyarthapratyayaprayoge 'py atrasta ity atrātrasnur ity akaraṇe 'pi na duṣṭatvam atrasnur iti vā nirdeśe agṛdhnur iti nirdoṣam eva /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1037: evaṃ ca dṛṣṭā dṛṣṭim adho dadāti kurute nālāpam ābhāṣitā ity atra yadi kartrabhiprāyatvaṃ kriyāphalasya,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1039: na cet tadā kuruta ity atra parasmaipadaprasaṅga iti prakramabhedaparyanuyogo niravakāśa eva /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1042: te kālaviśeṣādayaḥ tena vivakṣāprayuktatvena kāraṇena na darśitā ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1044: atra kartur ākhyātenābhidhānaṃ karmaṇaś cānabhidhānaṃ prakrāntaṃ visrabdhair ity anyathākṛtam iti kārakaprakramabhedaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1046: vivṛtam iti pāṭhe vistaraśālitvam ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1047: ratau vigraho virodhaḥ stanatair vyavahitas tatprasādād virodhasya kartum aśakyatvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1051: śābdaprakramabheda iti tu prakṛtiprakramabhedasyānukrameṇa ye paṭhanti taiḥ śābdaś cārthaś cottaro grantho nālocita ity upekṣyam etat /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1055: evam ārthaḥ prakramabheda ity atra prathamaprakrāntabhidyamānārthaviṣayatvād ārtha iti vyākhyeyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1059: na hīyam ārthaḥ prakramabheda iti atrodāharaṇadvitayaṃ dattaṃ mattateti samatayeti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1060: tatra mattatety atra saṅgamabhūṣety ārthena krameṇa prakramaḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1061: bhūṣayatīty atra tu śābdarūpatayā pratinirdeśa ity ārthaḥ prakramabhedaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1062: kiṃ tu tadvapus tad api cārutaratvam iti pāṭhaḥ sthitaparipāṭhyānuguṇyābhāvān na nyāyyaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1063: cārutā sa khalu sāpi śarīram iti tu pāṭhaḥ śreyān /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1064: evaṃ ca dayitasaṅgatir eṣety etacchabdaḥ paṭhanīyaḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1066: tatra hi mattatā kena śabdena parāmṛśyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1067: samatayety etat prāyeṇādarśeṣu śābdaprakramabhede udāharaṇatayā dṛśyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1069: ca anantarodāharaṇayor ādyam āhitaviparyayam iti pāṭhaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1070: etac cāyuktaṃ yojanagranthe varuṇasyārthaprakrama iti granthavirodhāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1071: kiṃ tu niyamayann iti vidagdhamanyatayā datto 'pi no hṛdayaṅgamaḥ pāṭhaḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1072: varuṇenaiva tat saṃbaddham ity atra pramāṇābhāvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1073: na hi varuṇasyānyopasarjanatvena sthitasya svātantryam asti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1075: ārthaprakramabhedaprastāve idam evodāharaṇam āhitaviparyayam iti pāṭhaḥ śreyān /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1083: sa hi niyamanād ity asyānantaraṃ paṭhanīyaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1084: loṣṭasaṃcāra ekaikasya bhedasya bhedāntaraiḥ saha saṃyojanaprakārākhyo gaṇanāviśeṣaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1089: tatpratyayasya ca pratinirdeśo na kṛta iti pratyayaprakramabhedo 'pi /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1090: abhinavapāṭhe tu tatpratyayarahitasyaiva laghuśabdasya pratinirdeśaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1092: so 'nudeśe vaiparītyād na kṛta iti pratīter aikyasya vigamād duṣṭatvam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1096: smaraṃ prati sāṃmukhyenābhidhānaṃ vihāya nenduṃ prāsaṅgikaṃ pratyayathārthajñānam ucitam iti smarasya tāvat prathamanirdeśo nyāyyaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1097: anudeśe tv idaṃ viṣayaṃ tyaktvā na prāsaṅgikena vākyārthaparisamāptiḥ śobhate iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1098: pāryavasānikena smareṇaiva saṃmukhīkriyamāṇena vākyārthaḥ parisamapanīya iti pāṭhakramāpekṣayā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1099: cūlikākrama eva sahṛdayahṛdayarañjaka iti kuśāgrīyadhiṣaṇair nipuṇaṃ nirūpaṇīyam etat /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1100: tathā ca yuṣmadasmadoḥ padasya padāt ṣaṣṭhīcaturthīdvitīyāsthayor vānnāvau iti cūlikākrameṇa vyavahāro dṛśyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1102: pradhānabhūtasyety arthapratipādanāya śabdaprayogāc chabdasyopāyamātratvād upāyānāṃ ca niyamābhāvāt / tad uktaṃ -
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1103: upādāyāpi ye heyās tān upāyān pracakṣate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1106: prakramabhedaviṣayasya vidhyanuvādabhāvaprakāratvāt prakramabhedo 'py upacārād vidhyanuvādaprakāra ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1107: anenaiva nyāyena śābdaś cārthaś ceti prakramabhedasya bhedadvayaṃ śābdārthaviṣayatvād boddhavyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1110: śabdabhede tasyaivārthasyānyasyeva pratīteḥ nāñjasena prakāreṇa vidhyanuvādabhāvaviṣayatvam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1112: na ca kāvye śāstrādivad arthapratītyarthaṃ śabdamātraṃ prayujyate,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1115: astv evam iti sāmānyena prakramabhedābhyupagamo viśeṣe tu paryanuyoga iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1117: yadbhedābhedābhyām iti hi yacchabdena prakramaḥ parāmṛśyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1118: prakramabhedaniyamaṃ pratīti tu pāṭhe yadbhedābhedābhyām iti prakramasyaivoddhṛtasya yathākathaṃ cit parāmarśo vyākhyeyaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1120: atra bhūṣayatīti śābdaṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ prakrāntam alaṅkriyetyādāv ārthena rūpeṇa pratinirdiṣṭam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1121: atra ca paryāyaprakramabhedaḥ sthito 'pi sāṃprataṃ na cintitaḥ śabdārthaprakramabhedacintanaprastāvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1123: atra vety arthād upameyam tadabhisaṃbandhaḥ śabdābhisaṃbandhaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1125: udāharaṇadvaye śuci bhūṣayati iti cārutā vapur iti ca /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1126: yādṛśam iti sthitapāṭhābhiprāyeṇānaucityaṃ dattapāṭhāśayena tv aucityam ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1130: tasmāt surārivety atra parāmṛśyata iti avivekākṣamaprajñatvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1132: utkaṭena bhaṇitivaicitryeṇa varṇanīyam ācchāditam ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1137: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ - yadi śabdavyāpāraviṣayasya prādhānyam arthavyāpāraviṣayasya cāprādhānyam iti vyavasthā,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1138: tadā trividhasya pratīyamānasya parair dhvanyatvena vyapanirdidiṣṭasyāsmābhir anumeyatvenopapāditasyāprādhānyaṃ prasajyeta tasyārthavyāpāraviṣayatvāt,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1141: tat katham iyaṃ prādhānyāprādhānyapratītir ghaṭata iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1142: cakrābhighātetyādau ca paryāyokte samāsoktivad gamyamānasyaiva prādhānyaṃ na vācyasyety upapāditaṃ prāk /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1144: sudarśanasya pulliṅgasya prakrāntatvād ya ity anena parāmarśāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1145: tat tv anavabudhya cakraṃ yadi parāmṛśyate,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1147: tan murārir evātra parāmṛśyata ity āśayena cakrābhighāteti paṭhanti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1149: tadapekṣayaiva prādhānyam aprādhānyaṃ ceti iha gamakam apradhānam upāyatvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1155: tayas tv iha gamyagamakabhāvaviviktaviṣayatvena cintā kṛtā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1159: kva cid yatra pratīyamānasadbhāvas tatrāprādhānyam ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1160: vācyaṃ hi pratīyamānaṃ prati gamakatvena vyavasthitaṃ tena tadapekṣatvenāprādhānyam iti tātparyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1161: vicitrā bhaṅgibhiṇitaya iti yathā bhaṭṭabāṇasya teṣu teṣu sthāneṣu /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1165: iti / vākyabhedāc ceti vākyāntarāpekṣayā hi vākyāntarasya bhaṅgibhaṇitivaicitryam ity aṃśena pratītivaidūryān na prakramabhedadoṣaṃ prakāśayati
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1171: kāraṇabhedaḥ punar utpattyapekṣayeti viśeṣaḥ / tad uktam -
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1172: ayam eva bhedo bhedahetur vā bhāvānāṃ yo 'yaṃ viruddhadharmādhyāsaḥ kāraṇabhedaś ca
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1175: śābdaś cārthaś ceti pūrvaṃ prakṛtyādiprakramabhedavilakṣaṇau śābdārthaprakramabhedau lakṣitāv udāhṛtau ca /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1176: adhunā vācyapratīyamānārthāpekṣayā paryavasānābhiprāyeṇa sarvaprakramabhedavyāpakau sāmānyena śābdārthaprakramabhedāv uktāv iti viśeṣo boddhavyaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1178: vastu varṇanīyaṃ yathā varṇayituṃ prakrāntaṃ tasya tathā nirvāhābhāvād vastuprakramabhedaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1180: prathame hi pāde avayavina eva svarūpeṇa varṇanaṃ prakrāntam ity avayavisaṃbandhitvena nirvāhaṇaṃ doṣaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1185: sādṛśyapratipādaneti dvicandram iti hi pāṭhe vadanena saha candro nabhaso dvicandratām āpādayati /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1186: tac ca vadanacandrayoḥ sādṛśyamūlam iti vyatirekaprakrame sādṛśyanirvāhāt prakramabhedaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1187: vastusargapaunaruktyasyeti punaruktavastuvirasa ity atra hi punaruktavastubhir virasa iti vyākhyāne sādṛśyena nirvāhaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1188: vyatirekeṇa ca prakrama iti doṣa evāyam vimukha iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1189: ke cit punaruktavastuṣu virasaḥ punaruktāni vastūni na karotīti vyākhyānena vyatirekanirvāhād yathāsthitapāṭhaṃ samarthayāṃ cakre /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1194: prasūnakṛtyaṃ dadataḥ sadartavaḥ pure 'sya vāstavyakuḍumbitāṃ dadhuḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1195: atra hi strīpuruṣayugalatrayarūpatayā ṛtūnāṃ varṇane prastute strīrūpāṇām ṛtunāṃ tṛtīyāsaṃbandhād aprādhānye vivakṣite yat tapena varṣā ity atra viparyayaḥ kṛtaḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1196: kṛte vā tathā nirdeśe śaradā himāgama ityādau yad anyathākaraṇaṃ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1198: yadi paraṃ strīpuṃsayor atra yena krameṇa prakramaḥ tasyānyathā nirvāhāt kramaprakramabhedam imaṃ vidmaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1200: tena varaṃ ghanaśriyoṣṇaḥ śaradā himāgamaḥ iti pāṭhaḥ kartavyaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1202: yatra yuṣmadasmadarthagataṃ kartṛtvaṃ śeṣe 'tra cetane 'cetane vā vaktrā buddhipūrvakam evāropyate,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1203: tatra kartur anyasyāropaś cārutvāya vyatyāso guṇa evety arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1207: yuṣmadasmadarthasya hi kva cit kartṛtvaṃ prakaraṇādyavasitaṃ na śabdenābhidhātuṃ prakrāntam iti nāyaṃ prakramabhedadoṣasya viṣayaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1208: anyatrāropyaivam uktam iti śeṣatvena vivakṣite rāmabhadre /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1209: evam uttaratra bhārgave vaṭau cānyatvaṃ yojanīyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1210: nanu yuṣmadasmadarthasya cetanatvāt tadapekṣayācetanasyaivānyatvam ucitam iti kathaṃ cetanasyaivānyatvam ity āha - dvividho hīti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1214: yuṣmadasmadarthau ca kramāt saṃbodhyamānavastuniṣṭhaḥ parabhāvo 'smitākhyā pratyaktā ca /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1216: tasya ca cetanatvācetanatvād dvaividhyam iti na virodhaḥ kaś cit /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1217: paraśunā candrahāsa iti krameṇa dvayor api yuṣmadasmadarthayor acetanaviṣayakartṛtāvyatyāsa udāharaṇam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1219: atra rāmaḥ svayaṃ yācata iti asmadarthakartṛtvasya cetanaviṣayavyatyāsasyānyat sthitam apy udāharaṇīyaṃ na cintitaṃ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1222: tad evam iyatā prabandhena prakramabhedaṃ vicārya kramaprāptaṃ kramabhedaṃ vicārayitum āha kramebhedo yatheti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1223: nanu yadi smṛtiparāmarśakasya tacchabdasyānubhūta evārtho viṣaya ity ucyate,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1224: ye 'tyantaparokṣā rāmādayas teṣāṃ kavinā kāvye tacchabdena kathaṃ parāmarśaḥ kriyate teṣām atīndriyatvād ity āha atra ca pratītimātram iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1228: smṛtiś ca pratītimātram antareṇānupapadyamānā tadapekṣiṇī syāt,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1229: naindriyikapratītyapekṣiṇī aindriyakapratītiṃ vināpi śabdādibhyaḥ pratītau tasyāḥ saṃbhavadarśanāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1230: rāmādīnāṃ ca yadi naindriyikī pratītis tadā śabdāt prasiddher vā pratītir astu /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1231: tannibandhanaś ca smṛtiparāmarśakena tacchabdena parāmarśa iti na kaś cid virodhaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1234: padārthavimarśapurassaro vākyārthavimarśa iti na padārthavimarśavelāyāṃ bhavatv iyam āśaṅkā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1235: vākyārthavimarśasamaye tv akhaṇḍapratītau pūrvāparabhāvaniyamāvabhāsanābhāvān nāsya doṣasyāvakāśaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1236: uddeśyatvāc ca vākyārthapratīter antaraṅgatvam iti tadāśrayeṇaiva vyavasthopapattau na kramadoṣacintā kā cid iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1240: vaktur iti yadi śortṛvimarśaparyavasāyī śabdavyavahāro vaktṛvimarśapraticchandakarūpo na syāt,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1241: tadā śabdair vaktṛvimarśasyāsaṃbandhitvād anumānaṃ na syād ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1242: tatra cāsāv iti vaktṛśrotṛgate vākyārthavimarśe sūkṣmatvenāsphuṭarūpo 'sty eva paurvāparyapratibhāsa iti yāvat /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1245: vaktṛśrotṛgatavākyārthavimarśe 'pi sūkṣmaḥ padārthāśrayo doṣo durnivāraḥ padārthān atikrameṇaiva vākyārthavimarśasya vyavasthitatvād ity arthaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1247: evaṃ sati prakraṃsyamānavastuparāmarśadoṣas tāvat parigṛhītā bhavati /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1250: tadīyatīrthābhidhāneti hetuhetumatos tadīyatīrthaśabdena vyavadhāne satīty arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1252: ayam atrāśayaḥ - śābdo yatra hetuhetumadbhāvas tatra hetutvenāpanyāsān na tayor vyavadhānaṃ kiṃ cit kāryam,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1254: ārthe hetuhetumadbhāve upanyastasya hetutvād viśeṣaṇabhūtasya hetor viśeṣyasvarūpavarṇanena caritārthatvāt saty api vyavadhāne na pratītiviprakarṣaḥ kaś cit,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1256: atra ca śloke tīrthe tadīye iti padadvayākaraṇe 'pi vākyārthasya nirākāṅkṣtvāt tatkaraṇam apuṣṭārtham eva /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1258: iti tacchabdaḥ āropanivṛttāv iti āropo bhramo 'nyasyānyatvena pratītiḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1260: tannivṛttāv atra vakṣyamānāyām āropaviṣayasya jaladharāder vastusataḥ prakāśamānasyedamādinā nyāyye nirdeśe tasya parāmṛśyasamīpa eva prayogeṇa bhāvyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1261: yas tv avastusadāropyamāṇanikaṭe prayogaḥ sa kramabhedam āvahati /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1262: yas tv atraivāropaviṣayasvarūpatayā vidyuto nikaṭa idam ādyaprayogaḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1264: utkhātadrutam iva śailaṃ himahatakamalākaram iva lakṣmīvimuktam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1265: pītamadiram iva caṣakaṃ bahulapradoṣam iva mugdhacandrarahitam //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1266: itīveti / atropalambharūpaḥ pūrvavākyārtha itiśabdāvacchinna utprekṣyata ity upālabdhety ataḥ pūrvam itīvaśabdau prayojyau /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1274: uktiḥ stamberamaḥ pariṇinaṃsur asāv upaiti ity eṣā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1275: tasyā viṭasaṃbandhinyāḥ svarūpam itiśabdenopalakṣaṇatvād evaṃśabdādinā vyavacchettum iṣṭam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1276: ataś ca tatra tasmād itiśabdād itiśabdopalakṣitād evamādayaś ca prāk pūrvam ukteḥ pūrvapradarśitāyāḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1277: anyat kiṃ cit padaṃ ṣidga ityādi na kathanīyam ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1279: upādhibhāvād iti itiśabdasya svā śaktiḥ pūrvavākyāvacchedarūpā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1280: tāṃ pūrvatra vākye samarpayaṃs tasyopādhir itiśabdaḥ saṃpadyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1281: ataś ca na tasyānyatra prayogaḥ karttavya ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1287: iti nyāyenārthaucityavaśād vyavahitānām apy ānantaryaniyamo bhaviṣyatīty arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1291: iti teṣāṃ prayogo niyataḥ syād ity uktam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1292: nanu yasya yenābhisaṃbandho nyāyyaḥ kutrāvatiṣṭhatām ity āha kaiś cid eveti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1293: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ - ityādiśabdavarjanenoktakrameṇa śabdahetvādivarjanena cānyeṣāṃ śabdānām ayaṃ nyāyaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1296: evam uddeśakrameṇa kramabhedaṃ vimṛśya paunaruktyaṃ vicārayitum āha paunaruktyam iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1297: iha khalu dvividhaṃ paunaruktyaṃ śabdapaunaruktyam arthapaunaruktyaṃ ceti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1298: tad uktam akṣpādamuninā - śabdārthayoḥ punarvacana[ṃ] punaruktam anyatrānuvādād iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1301: arthapaunaruktyam evaikaṃ paunaruktyaṃ na śabdapaunaruktyam iti samudāyārthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1310: anyatra tātparyabhedād iti tātparyabhede hi svarūpārthāviśeṣe lāṭānuprāsa iṣṭaḥ / tad uktaṃ -
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1312: śabdānāṃ vā padānāṃ vā lāṭānuprāsa iṣyate //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1313: iti / śakrasaṅkāśeti śrīnadīhaṃseti medinīcandreti vidviṣāṃ kāleti ca catvāryāmantraṇāṇi /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1315: tathā caikaḥ kāśaśabdo vastrāṇām upameyatvena sthitaḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1316: anyas tu hasānām upamānatveneti bhinnaṃ tātparyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1318: ubhayābhāve iti arthabhedasya tātparyabhedasya cābhāva ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1319: na ca ghāseti karmatvena saṃbandhitvena cāstu tātparyabheda ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1322: etad uktaṃ bhavati - na svārthābhidhānam eva tātparyam,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1323: api tu saty eva svārthābhidhāne 'dhikam arthāntaronmukhatvaṃ tātparyaṃ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1327: na hy atra bisajātyavacchinnadravyātiriktaṃ kiṃ cid vastu pratīyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1328: yat tu karmatvaṃ saṃbandhitvaṃ ca tadabhidheyasyaiva tathāvasthānaṃ nodrekeṇānyatām āvahatīti svaśabdaparihāreṇa sarvanāmaparāmarśasyaiva viṣayo nyāyya iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1329: nanu punaruktaṃ kim ucyate yatra tat prayogaṃ vinārthapratītiḥ yatra ca tatsamānapadāntaraprayogo 'vaśyam upayujyate,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1333: yatra tu tat samānaṃ padāntaram upayujyatāṃ mā vā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1334: sarvathā tatprayogakṛta vairasyaṃ paunaruktyaprayojakam iti tadāśrayeṇāyaṃ doṣa uktaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1335: sarvanāmeti jakṣur bisam ity atra nirdiṣṭaṃ bisam uttaratra prasūnasaṃbandhitvena sarvanāmaparāmarśārhaṃ sad yat svaśabdenoktaṃ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1337: yady apy arthapunaruktam evaikaṃ punaruktaṃ prāg uktaṃ tathāpi śabdasya punaruktatety uktam arthamukhenaiva śabdasyāpi punaruktatety abhiprāyeṇa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1338: sarvanāmaparāmarśayogyasyeti nirdiṣṭāṃ yogyatāṃ vibhaktum āha - prādhānyam iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1340: tatra yasmin parāmṛśyasya svātantryeṇa kartṛtvādinā nirdeśena prādhānyaṃ tatra śābdam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1341: yatra punaḥ parāmṛśyasyānyaḥ kaś cit saṃbandhitvena nirdiśyate,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1343: tatra hi saṃbandhinaṃ prati asyopayoga eva yogyatvam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1346: atra saṃbandhī haraḥ tasya maulidvāreṇa śaśāṅkasaṃbandhitvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1348: na tu cārutā vapur ityādau cārutāder iva sākṣād eva śaśāṅkasya pratītiḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1350: atra saṃbandhinibandha iti kārikāyāṃ yaḥ saṃbandhī yuktaḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1359: api tu sā cety anena svarūpam nirdiṣṭam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1362: tatra hi parāmṛśyasya samāse guṇībhāvāt saṃbandhinaś cānirdeśāt parāmarśo na nyāyyaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1364: asyārthaḥ - yathāsmai rocate viśvaṃ tathedaṃ parivartate iti nyāyenātrātiprauḍhatayā granthakāro nijāyattāṃ padārthavyavasthāṃ karttum ārabdhaḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1365: yena tadaṃśunicitaḥ iti tat tamasām iti ca śaśāṅkasya niśāyāś ca tacchabdena parāmarśam aghaṭamānam api samarthayate,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1366: jakṣur bisaṃ ghṛtavikāsibisaprasūnā ity atra ca bisaprasūnaśabdasya saṃjñāpadasyāpi bisaśabdāśrayeṇa sūkṣmekṣikayā paunaruktyaṃ doṣam udbhāvayati
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1368: yasmāc chaśāṅkamaulir iti ca niśāpatimaulir iti ca saṃjñāśabdāv etau /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1369: saṃjñāśabdānāṃ ca vidyamānasyāpy arthānugamasya na prayojakatvaṃ rūḍheḥ prādhānyāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1370: tataś cātra na śaśāṅkārtho na niśārthaḥ kaś cit /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1371: kiṃ tūpāyamātreṇaitāv arthāv āśritya saṃjñiviśeṣa evātra vivakṣitaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1372: evaṃ ca saṃjñyantargatayoḥ śaśāṅkaniśayos tacchabdaparāmarśena sahṛdayahṛdayāny āvarjayatīti haṭhasarmathanam etat /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1373: kiṃ ca śaśāṅkamaulir ity atra varaṃ śaśāṅkasya bhavatu sarvanāmnā parāmarśaḥ tasya vakrākṛtes tatra saṃnihitatvāt,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1374: niśāpatimaulir ity atra tu niśāyāḥ parāmarśaḥ pāpāt pāpīyān niśāpater evoktakrameṇa tatra saṃnihitatvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1376: yatra ca tasyā eva na saṃbhavas tatra kā vārtā tamasām /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1378: tam anaṅgulir āvayad iti nyāya āyāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1379: api ca yatra prasāritānugamena śabdena saṃjñinaḥ pratyāyanaṃ kriyate,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1382: tatprabhābhir iva pūritaṃ vapur bhāti yasya sitabhasmaguṇṭhitam //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1383: iti / atra hi pādavyāpinī saṃjñānvarthatvam evotkarṣayati /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1385: prakṛte tu tādṛśy api gatir nāsti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1387: atrāpi hi rohiṇīramaṇetyādau yadi sūkṣmekṣikā kriyate tadā saṃjñāprādhānyāt tadaṃśasya sarvanāmaparāmarśo nāduṣṭatām bhajate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1390: tad etad asya viśvam agaṇanīyaṃ manyamānasya svātmanaḥ sarvotkarṣaśālitākhyāpanam iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1391: granthakarttuḥ punar ayam āśayaḥ - iha tu dvividhāḥ saṃjñāśabdāḥ rūḍhā yogarūḍhayaś ca /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1392: tatra rūdḥānām arthānugamābhāvāt tadanusaraṇaṃ na karttavyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1393: ye tu yogarūḍhayas teṣāṃ yadi yoga utkaṭatāṃ bhajate tadāśrayo vyavahāro na duṣyati /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1394: ata eva nimittabalena pravṛttasya śabdasya nimittāntarbhāve prayogaḥ saugatair niṣiddha eva / yad āhuḥ -
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1396: śabdānām anurundhāno na bādhas tena varṇitaḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1397: iti / evaṃ sthite yogāśrite vyavahāre yadi saṃjñāvayavabhūtārthasyāvyabhicārī kaś cit pratipipādayiṣitaḥ syāt tadā tadabhisaṃbandhāya tasyāvayavasya sarvanāmaparāmarśo na duṣṭaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1399: maulir ity atra śaśāṅkāvyabhicāriṇo raśmayaḥ saṃbandhitvena pratipāditāḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1401: teṣāṃ cāvāstavatvam api na tathā duṣṭam,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1404: paratra tu saṃbandhisaṃbandhī parāmṛṣṭa iti viśeṣaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1405: tad evaṃ yaugikānāṃ saṃjñāśabdānāṃ yoganimitto vyavahāraḥ kva cit kva cit suvyavasthita eva /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1406: yat tu kuryāṃ harasyāpi pinākapāṇer ity atra pinākapāṇipadasya saṃjñāśabdasya sato 'rthānugamo nivārayiṣyate yena saṃjñāvagamārthaṃ haraśabdaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1408: kiṃ tv anugamyamānasyārthasya saṃrambhāspadatvena vivakṣitatvaṃ pṛthak saṃjñāpadaprayogam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1409: antareṇa na nirvahati saṃjñārthasyārthānugamasya ca yugapat prādhānyābhāvād iti dvayaprayoga
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1411: prakṛte vastusvarūpamātrapratipādane saṃjñāśabdatve 'py arthānugamānusaraṇam avyāhatam iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1412: itarathety ubhayavidhayogyatābhāve parāmṛśyapratīter abhāvād ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1417: kriyākārakabhāvasyākhyātapadavācyatvena śābdena krameṇa prastāve 'tra viśeṣaṇadvāreṇa samāsena pra to 'rthaḥ pratīter ārthatvam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1421: atra keśāśvābhyāṃ yañchau iti samūhe 'rthe chapratyayaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1422: evaṃ chapratyayaḥ saṃhatiśabdaś ca bhisaḥ prakṛtitvena nirdiṣṭau punar uktau /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1424: biseti bisakisalayacchedapātheyā iti tvaguttarāsaṅgām iti ca vācyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1427: karmadhārayamatvarthīyau samuccayenāvasthitau vṛttilāghavād bahuvrīhiṇā bādhyete ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1431: iti bahavo bhūmādayo 'rthā astyartham anugacchanto mattvarthīyatāviṣayatvenoktāḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1432: te kim iti na bahuvrīhivācyatvenoktā ity āha mator iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1434: bhūmādayo hy arthā na kevalebhyo matubādibhyaḥ pratīyante,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1435: kiṃ tu prakraṇādisahāyebhyas tebhya iti na matubādivicāreṇodāhriyante,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1437: jāmbaveti tadīyeti vanyeti ca taddhitapratyayasya paunaruktyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1442: nedam artha iti nātra taddhitasya paunaruktyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1445: atra janaśabdenaiva samūhārthapratītes talpratyayarūpāyāḥ prakṛter bahuvacanasya pratyayasya ca paunaruktyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1446: pūrvavad iti dalatkandaleti lambāmbudam iti phullāmbujā iti ca bahuvrīhiṇaiva bhajaty arthādīnāṃ pratīteḥ punar uktatvam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1448: tatra viśiṣṭaviśeṣyarūtayā pratītau yatra viśeṣaṇamātrād eva viśeṣyasyaiva pratītiḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1449: tatra viśeṣyaprayogo na duṣyati yathā tatra prasādād ity atra vakṣyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1450: kiṃ tūpāyamatreṇaitāva bhavaśabdasyeti śītakiraṇābharaṇa ity anenaiva pratītatvād bhavārthasya,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1451: yathā nidhānagarbhām iva sāgarāmbarām ity atra sāgarāmbarāśabdena medinyāḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1454: ekatarasyeti indravāhanaśabdaprayoge kuthasāmarthyān nāgendrapratītir nāgendraśabdaprayoge ca śuklavarṇasya varṇitatvād indravāhanapratītir ity ekatarasyaiva prayogo nyāyyaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1455: yatra tad ityādinā viśiṣṭaviśeṣyarūpatayā viśeṣyapratipattim udāharati /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1457: haraśabdasyeti pinākapāṇiśabdena haragato viśeṣaḥ pratipādyate yaḥ sarvotkarṣahetutvena vivakṣito na sajñimātram ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1459: kusumāyudhaśabdo 'pi hi viśeṣaṇam api viśeṣyam avagamayaty avyabhicārāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1461: atrāpīti pinākapāṇer ity atra liṅuttamapuruṣeṇaiveti asmady uttamaḥ ity atra hi sthāniny apīty anuvartanād aprayukte 'py asmacchabde tadarthasaṃbhave uttamapuruṣo bhavaty eva /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1464: bahuvacanād īdṛkṣu sthāneṣv ekenaivevaśabdena gatārthatvād anyeṣāṃ prayogo viphala ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1466: padārthaupamyavivakṣaṇe tu yāvanto viśeṣyabhūtāḥ padārthās tāvanta ivaśabdāḥ prayoktavyāḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1467: na tv ardhajaratīyaṃ kāryam ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1469: na tu saṃbhavantyāṃ vākyārthopamāyāṃ padārthopamāḥ kāryā ity asya pakṣaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1470: tathā ca dine dine ityādinā dūṣayiṣyati /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1477: dine dine ityādi pārvatīndulekhayoḥ sādhāraṇo dharmaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1478: na tu kalāntarāṇi kartṝṇi jyotsnāntarāṇi puṣṇatīti sādhvī vyākhyā vacanabhedādidoṣaprasaṅgāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1479: atra cāndramasīva lekhā kalāntarāṇi puṣṇātīty ekenaivevaśabdena gatārthatve dvitīyasyevaśabdasya paunaruktyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1481: atra yam ity asya caṇḍamāruta upamānaṃ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1485: atra ca datte 'pi pāṭhe karmabhūtayor upameyopamānayor lalāṭalekhayetyādivijātīyapadagarbhitatvaṃ vikṛtapadaprayogo vairasyaṃ ca dupariharam eva /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1487: evaṃ hi miśabdasthāne naśabdamātrakaraṇena stokamātravyatyāsena saukaryeṇa doṣaparihārapratītiḥ saundaryaṃ ca /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1488: malayajārdram iveti himāṃśukhaṇḍasyotprekṣyatvenopanibaddham ākāṅkṣāsaṃnidhisāmarthyāl lalāṭataṭasya viśeṣaṇaṃ paryavasyatīti kaver abhiprāyaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1489: vastutas tv ivaśabdaprayogam antareṇāpīṣṭasiddher ivaśabdaḥ punar uktaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1490: na candrakhaṇḍasya malayajārdratvotprekṣaṇe prayojanaṃ kiṃ cit /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1496: kevalaṃ hārīty asya samāsākaraṇād ivārthāpratīter ivaśabdo na punar ukta iti paunaruktyaparihāraḥ kṛtaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1501: iti / vakroktijīvitakṛtas tu tam alaṅkārapuṣṭhapātinam alaṅkāraṃ dūṣayati /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1506: tathā hi nirmokānuguṇyāt tāvat gaganasyorageṇa rūpaṇam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1507: nirvyūḍhe ca rūpake nirmokam uktir na tāṭasthyena pratīyate,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1509: gaganoragasaṃbandhitvena ca pratītau na sādṛśyam api tv adhyavasāyaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1510: tasya ca pravṛttamānatvam ity utprekṣaiva jyāyāsī pratītau /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1512: anyathā śuddhasādṛśyapratipādane dharmy eva viśiṣṭo nirmoka upamānatvena nirdeśyaḥ syāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1513: bhinnaliṅgayor upamāyā duṣṭatvān na nirdiṣṭa iti cen na /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1514: sādhāraṇadharmasyānirdeśe nirdiṣṭasyāpi vā dvairūpyābhāve bhinnaliṅgasaṅkhyayor api
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1515: strīva gacchati ṣaṇḍo 'yam ityādau hantāvahanti doṣā iva nṛpatīnāṃ guṇa iha sahaivadurvinayam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1518: utprekṣāyāṃ kriyāmātrotprekṣaṇam upapadyata ity utprekṣārūpakam etat paramārthataḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1519: etad asmābhir harṣacaritavārttike vistṛtya pratipāditaṃ tata evāvaseyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1522: atra tamaso 'raṇyena rūpeṇa vahnir arcissaṃbandhitayā vivakṣitaḥ samāse niveśanīyaḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1523: yato na kaś cid atra nirdiṣṭaḥ yo vahninā rūpyeta /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1524: tasmāt tamoraṇyasya vahnyarcir iti vaktavyam ity atra vācyāvacanaṃ doṣaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1525: ālānam iti saty eva sādṛśye āropyāropakabhāvasya nidarśanam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1528: atra copamārūpakābhimate evaṃvidhe ca pradeśe granthakāro hevākitayaiva dūṣaṇam adāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1530: vicchittiś ca kavipratibhollāsarūpatvāt kavipratibhollāsasya cānantyād anantatvaṃ bhajamānā na paricchettuṃ śakyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1533: nibaddhā sā kṣayaṃ naiti prakṛtir jagatām iva //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1536: iti / evaṃ ca yadi vicchttyantarāpekṣayā tasya vicchittyantarasya paunaruktyaṃ tadopamāyā rūpakādyapekṣayā paunaruktyaṃ syāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1537: upamāpekṣayā hi rūpakam atiśayoktir vā balīyasī /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1540: tathā hi kva cit sādṛśyamātraṃ vivakṣitam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1544: adhyavasāye 'pi kva cit sādhyatvaṃ kva cit siddhatvam ityādikrameṇānantaprakāraṃ vicchittivaicitryam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1545: tatrāpi saṃyojanakrameṇa navaṃ vicchittivaicitryam anubhūyamānam āśritaṃ ca mahākavibhiḥ kathaṃ saṃkṣeparucitvenāpahnūyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1548: tatrāpi vā na niyamena lāghavam āśritaṃ mahadbhiḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1549: tathā hi vāgrahaṇasya sthāne 'nyatarasyāṃ grahaṇam api kṛtam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1551: tad uktaṃ vicitrā hi sūtrasya kṛtiḥ pāṇineḥ iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1552: evaṃ cātra kṛte 'pi rūpake utprekṣādinibandhaḥ kam api guṇam utkarṣayati na doṣam iti sahṛdayair nipuṇaṃ nirūpaṇīyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1553: na tu hevākasya paścāl laganīyam ity āstāṃ tāvat /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1558: paritaśśabdayoge abhitaḥ paritaḥ samayānikaṣā iti dvitīyā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1559: atra dadhur ivetīvaśabdaḥ punar ukta eva,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1561: tat pātu vaḥ śrīpatinābhipadmaṃ svādhyāyaśālā kamalāsanasya /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1562: dīrghair ninādair dadhate 'nukāraṃ sāmadhvanīnām iva yatra bhṛṅgāḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1564: prativastvalaṅkārād iti pūrṇaḥ śaśāṅkābhyudayam ākāṅkṣati mahārṇavaḥ iti prativastūpamayā sādṛśyapratītau dṛṣṭāntaśabdoktir duṣṭā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1567: na hi ṣaṣṭhyādiparihāreṇa saṃbandhiśabdāt saṃbandhapratītiḥ rasaśabdād vā rasapratītiḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1569: nanu svakaṇṭhenābhidhānam apahāya kim iti sādṛśyapratītir āśrīyata ity āha vācyo hy artha iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1571: pūrvaṃ yathā ālānam ity ādau rūpakamukhenopamānopameyabhāvaḥ kathitas tadvad iha dīpakamukhenety arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1572: atra ca dvayoḥ prabhādhenvoḥ prākaraṇikatvāt tulyayogitām adyatanā manyante /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1573: dvayor api prākaraṇikatve mahāprakaraṇāpekṣayā dhenoḥ prakṛṣṭaṃ prākaraṇikatvaṃ prabhāyās tv aprakrṣṭam ity etadapekṣayā cirantanair dīpakam etat sthāpitam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1577: draviṇam āpadi bhūṣaṇam utsave śaraṇam ātmabhaye niśi dīpikāḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1578: bahuvidhārthyupakārabharakṣamo bhavati ko 'pi bhavān iva san maṇiḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1579: ity atrāprastutapraśaṃsayā bhavadarthasya sadṛśatvena pratīteḥ punar vacanaṃ na karttavyam iti vakṣyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1581: itinaiveti itiśabdo hetvarthah prayujyamānaḥ svabhāvataḥ pūrvavākyārthasyocyamānatvaṃ bodhyamānatvaṃ vā garbhīkṛtya pravartate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1586: aviśeṣaṇa iti viśeṣaṇadānārtham avyabhicāriṇo 'pi prayogaḥ śasyata ity arthaḥ tathā cāha vāmanaḥ - viśeṣaṇasya ca iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1587: vyalokyateti vilokanakriyaiva lokitāraṃ lokam ākṣipatīti lokaśabdasya paunaruktyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1589: gām iti gośabdasya vākparyāyasya vacanakriyāyām avyabhicārāt prayogo na kāryaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1590: dṛṣṭa iti darśanakriyāyā dṛg eva karaṇatvenākṣipteti dṛkśabdaḥ punar uktaḥ /
