GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1591: kārakāntareṣv apīti yathā sthāne tiṣṭhati ity atrādhikaraṇasya paunaruktyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1592: vivikte sthāne tiṣṭhatīti tu viśeṣaṇārthaṃ prayogo na duṣṭaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1596: atisphuṭām iti sthūladṛṣṭyaiva dṛśyām ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1598: atra śarajanmanā yathetyādinā pratīto 'py upamānopameyabhāvas tatsadṛśenetyādinā punar uktaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1601: tathā cāyaṃ dilīpa iti rājendur induḥ kṣīranidhāv iva ity evaṃvidham upamānopameyabhāvam ātanoti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1602: granthakāras tu viśiṣṭopamānanirdeśān nāntarīyakatayā prabhāvādipratītir bhavatīti na dvirupādānaṃ kāryam iti manyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1603: yasyeti yasya pūrvatāder yadrūpatāyāḥ priyatamādirūpatvasyābhivyaktiḥ sāmarthyāl liṅgaviśeṣaśliṣṭapadopanibandhanarūpād bhavati,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1604: tasya parvatādeḥ tadarthaṃ priyatamādirūpatvapratītyartham upamā rūpakaṃ vā yan nibadhyate,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1606: uravo mahāntaḥ payodharā meghāḥ urū ca payodharau stanau ca /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1610: upamānād eveti ākārasādṛśyena palāśaṃ prati dīyamānād ārdranakhakṣatam ity asmāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1611: tadviśeṣaṇopādānam iti ramaṇadattam ity ārdranakhakṣataviśeṣaṇopādānaṃ madayāpitalajjayeti pramadāviśeṣaṇopādānaṃ cety arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1612: yata iti nakhakṣatam ivety upamopakṛtāt surabhivanamālādīnāṃ puṃstvastrītvanirdeśād ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1614: aindraṃ dhanur iti atyanteti ābhogīti codāharaṇatrayaṃ vaidharmyakrameṇoktam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1618: evam aṅganeva maṇistambhāv iti anumīyata iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1619: bhogī vāsukeḥ sa eva netram ākarṣaṇarajjus tasya ā samantād yat parivartanarūpo viśeṣeṇa bhramo bhramaṇaṃ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1620: tena mandarasya mūrttiḥ nitambe madhyabhāge valanaṃ parivarttanaṃ tenākulā jātā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1621: tathā ābhogi vistāravat yan netraṃ nayanaṃ tasya parivartanaṃ kaṭākṣīkaraṇaṃ sa eva vibhramo vilāsaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1623: utkalikās taraṅgā ruhiruhikāś ca hṛdayaṃ madhyadeśāś cittaṃ ca /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1629: alaṅkārāntaratvam iti sādṛśyāl lakṣaṇā vakroktir ityādiprakāreṇa /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1630: lākṣaṇikahṛdayādiśabdaprayoge svaśabdaṃ vināpy arthāntaraṃ pratīyata ity āha yadartheti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1632: yadarthaikāśrayo nāyakādirūpopamānaviṣayo dharmo hṛdayādir āropito lakṣaṇayā bhavet,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1633: tayor nāyakāder upamānasyāmbunidhyādeś copameyasyopamānopameyabhāvaḥ śābdo neṣyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1636: mūlāny amātyādiprakṛtivargaḥ vṛkṣāvabandhanāni ca unmūlayituṃ sukara iti yojanā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1643: atra niṣkāsanam utkaṭatvena gaṇikādharmo rūpakasya sādhakaḥ pramāṇam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1651: paryāyoktīti yena rāhustrīstanayoḥ kārkaśyalakṣmīr vṛthā kṛtety anena bhaṅgyantareṇa rāhoḥ śiraśchedaḥ prakāśita iti tatsādhanam asādhāraṇaṃ cakraṃ pratīyata evety arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1652: padādīti padādigatānām akṣarāṇām anuprāso gumphabhaṅgī darśayan kavīnām atyantavallabha ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1656: śatrur eva śātrava iti prajñāditvāt svārthe 'ṇ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1657: tadrūpaṇam eveti upamāpekṣayā rūpakasya gamyamānaupamyatvāt prayogārhatve 'pi sāmarthyāvagatarūpatvād yatrābhidhānaṃ punar uktaṃ tatropamāyāṃ paunaruktye kā śaṅkā iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1658: ivaśabdasyeti mūrcchita iva mūrcchayatīty arthapratīteḥ siddhatvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1659: viṣādisaṃparkād dhi mohaṃ prāptaḥ parān api mohayatīti prasiddham /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1660: ayaṃ mandadyutir iti nidarśanāyāṃ mamevety arthāt pratītaṃ na punar upāttam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1663: anena yatraikasyaiva viśeṣaṇasyopamānopameyasaṃbandhabādhakam asti tatra pṛthakprayoge 'pi na doṣaḥ, yathā -
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1668: prākaraṇikatvopamānopameyabhāvapratītau sādharaṇadharmasya pṛthakprayogam antareṇa vākyārthasaṅgatir na bhavatīti pṛthak prayogo na duṣṭaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1675: samāsāntarapadāśrayaṇeneti umā ca mā ca umāme /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1677: chāyānihatapadayor iti prathamaṃ chāyāśabdaḥ dvitīyaś nihataśabdaḥ kartavyaḥ syād iti dārṣṭāntikakrameṇaiva dṛṣṭāntāv uktau /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1680: dvandvapūrvakasya bahuvrīher bahuvrīhipūrvakasya vā dvandvasyety arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1681: etac ca dṛṣṭāntagatatvenoktam api dārṣṭāntikagatatvenāpi paryavasānaṃ neyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1683: tatpuruṣapūrvasya dvandvasya dvandvapūrvasya vā tatpuruṣasya lakṣaṇānugamaḥ saṃbhavatīti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1687: evaṃ na dvandvalakṣaṇam ity atra tatpuruṣalakṣaṇapūrvakatvaṃ boddhavyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1689: atajjātīya iti yatra tatpuruṣaśaṅkā nāstīti pārvatīparameśvarāv ity atrāpi parameśvarapade karmadhārayāśrayaṇadarśanena tatpuruṣapūrvakatvaṃ yojanīyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1691: atra mādhavaśabdasya yaugikatve 'pi samṃjñātvena nrūḍher umāmādhavāv iti prayoge
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1692: umāyā mādhavasya ca spṛṣṭatvena pratītir na tu dvandvapūrvakatatpuruṣārthasyeti dvandvalakṣaṇaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1694: rekhā hīti rekhā maryādā avadhiḥ sīmeti paryāyāḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1696: atra saṃsārasaṃbhavasya nirākaraṇam iti heyasya pratikṣepaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1698: atra saṃpadaḥ prasaro vistāra ity upādeyasya parigrahaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1699: indūdayasyeva saṃnibhā yasyeti atra saṃnibhāśabdaḥ prabhāparyāyo vyākhyātaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1700: yathā tu dāṇḍo granthas tathā saṃnibhaśabdaḥ sadṛśaparyāyo 'sti tad uktam -
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1702: iti / tadanusāreṇendūdayena sadṛśa indūdayasaṃnibha iti vyākhyeyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1704: mūḍhacetana iti mūḍhadhiya iti ca mohanāmno mūḍhatvasya buddhidharmatvāt cetanadhīśabdayoḥ paunaruktyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1705: tatsaṃbandhāt tadavagatir iti cetanasaṃbandhāc caitanyāvagatir ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1707: kṛpā cetanadharma iti caitanyavācipadaṃ na kṛtam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1708: evaṃ mūḍhāḥ mūḍhaḥ ity atrāpi vācyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1710: manaḥkartṛkatvaṃ pramodaḥ kriyākaraṇaśabdayor iti atra gauḥ śābaleya itivac chokakriyāśabdayoḥ sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvena prayogaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1711: granthakṛtas tu viśeṣasyaivopayogāt sāmānyāvyabhicārāc ca kriyāśabdasya vaiyarthyam karaṇaśabdasya kriyāvācitvān niṣphalatvam iti śokaśabda eva karttavya ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1713: vaiśeṣikās tu jaḍam evātmaguṇam ekārthasamavāyinā jñānena grāhyaṃ sukham āhuḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1719: atra samābhātīty ekaṃ padaṃ gaṇitam upasargāṇāṃ dyotyapāratantryeṇa pṛthakpadārhatvābhāvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1720: ekādiprayoge satīti ekasya prayogābhyupagame 'nyeṣām eva tattvam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1726: tathāpy avivekasyāvimṛśyakāritvaprayojakatvāt tasya kāraṇatve 'py avimṛśyakāritvam eva kāraṇam uktaṃ bhavati /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1727: na hīti yasmin sati vahnau dhūma ityādike pratibandhakālabhāviny anvaye sati viśeṣaṇasya yasya asati vahnau na dhūma ityādivyatirekasya gatiḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1728: tasyānvayasya sa eva vyatireko hetur yuktaḥ vayavasthitasya hetuhetumadbhāvasya vaiparītyaprasaṅgāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1729: anvayapratītihetuko hi vyatirekapratītyupakramo na tu viparyayaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1730: viśeṣaṇāc ceti guṇalubdhā iti sādhāraṇatvād ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1735: prakṛtipratyayārthasyeti prakṛtyarthaḥ pratyayārthaḥ prakṛtipratyayasamudāyārtha iti vyastasamastatvena yojyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1736: evaṃ prakṛteḥ pratyayasya cety atrāpi vācyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1739: vastuvṛttyā sthitasya bahuvrīher yā karmadhārayaśaṅkā tayā matvarthīyādiḥ śabdaḥ kṛto bisakisalayacchedapātheyavanta ityādau /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1741: yasminn iti jāmbavapallavādaunītyādau yasmin pallavaśabda ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1742: arthaḥ yatra + tyalakṣaṇo yattaddhitotpattiḥ yasmād aṇpratyayākhyāt taddhitād utpattiḥ pratītiviṣayatvāpattir yasyārthasya /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1748: viśiṣṭam utkarṣāpakarṣavantaṃ saṃjñinaṃ harādikaṃ yatrecchet na tatra paunaruktyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1750: yathā pāyāt sa śītakiraṇābharaṇo bhavo vaḥ ityādau /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1753: yadvad iti dṛṣṭāntamukhena janair ajātaskhalanair ityādi saṅgṛhītam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1756: athavā yatra kārakaviśeṣavaśāt kriyāyāḥ pratītiḥ kriyāviśeṣavaśād vā kārakasya,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1757: tatra kriyākārakayoḥ prayogo na kārya ity ayam arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1759: yo yaddharmeti aparadiggaṇiketyādau yo diglakṣaṇo 'rtho yaddharmasya gaṇikādharmasya niṣkāsanāder upacāreṇopalakṣitaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1760: tathā ambunidher mamanthe ityādau yasya kāmukasya saṃbandhaṃ yad hṛdayādi tetyanānvito 'mbudhilakṣaṇo yaś cārthaḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1766: tatkriyāyāṃ ca khaḍgena cchadakriyāyāṃ rūḍhāyāṃ sādhakatamasya khaḍgasya yāni bahūni tadapekṣayāṅgāni dhārāvinipātādīni teṣāṃ vāg vacanaṃ neṣyate yathā karakalitetyādau /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1768: rājādau karttari cchedādikriyāyāṃ yat sādhakatamaṃ khaḍgādyaṅgaṃ tasyāpy aṅgānāṃ dhārāvinipātādīnāṃ vacanaṃ neṣyate tenaivāṅgena pradhānabhūtenāvāntarāṅgānām apy ākṣepād /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1769: doṣadvayaṃ prayukteti karttari iti ca pratipāditam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1772: samāse vākye vā asādhāraṇaṃ yatra viśeṣaṇaṃ tatra viśeṣyaṃ na vācyaṃ yathā duḥkhānubhavetyādau /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1773: yo yadātmeti bāṣpāder jalādirūpatvāvyabhicārāt prayojanābhāve jalādipadaprayogā na kārya ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1775: yo yasyeti yo niṣyandanādiḥ yasya candrakāntāder dharmiṇo 'vyabhicārī dharmaḥ tayoḥ samāso na praśasyate,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1779: kriyeti kriyāyāḥ śokādilakṣaṇāyāḥ pratītiḥ karaṇapratītiṃ na vyabhicarati karaṇam eva yataḥ kriyā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1780: tadapratītau karaṇāpratītau saiva śokādilakṣaṇā kriyā na niścitā syād ekatvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1783: tayadvaśāt śokādiśabdaprayogavaśād yasya karaṇasya vyaktiḥ prakāśas taduktau śākādiśabdaprayoge tat karaṇādivat padaṃ na prayuñjītety arthaḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1787: ubhayor uktir ekasya ubhayamadhyāt kasya cit /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1790: evaṃ paunaruktyaṃ saprapañcaṃ vicārya vācyāvacanaṃ prapañcayitum āha - vācyasyāvacanaṃ yatheti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1791: asamāsena nirdeśo vakṣyamāṇam etatsamānanyāyam avācyasya vacanam api kaṭākṣayitum /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1792: idamā parāmarśa iti abādhitapratyakṣanimittatvād bhrāntinivṛtteḥ pratyakṣasya ca viṣayamukhena parāmarśārhatvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1793: tasya yat svaśabdena vacanam iti pūrvaṃ saty eva sarvanāmni punaḥ svaśabdena pratipādanaṃ -
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1797: idānīṃ tu sarvanāmasthanīyatvena svaśabdena vacanaṃ vācyāvacanam ucyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1812: na caiṣām iti tenaiva tatparyāyeṇa sarvanāmnā cety eṣāṃ prakārāṇām /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1820: na cārthabhede śabdasyaikatvaṃ nyāyyam arthabhedasya pradhānabhūtasya guṇabhūtaṃ śabdaṃ prati bhedakatvam tvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1821: tasmād atra dvayoḥ śabdayor vastuvṛttena yat sādṛśyaṃ yaś ca sādṛśyahetukaḥ pratipattṛṛṇām ekatābhramaḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1838: alaṅkārāntaraviviktaviṣayābhāvena sarvālaṅkārāpavādatvāc śleṣasyopamāpratibhotpattihetuḥ śleṣa evātra nyāyyo nopamety abhiprāyaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1839: ata eva śleṣe tu tasya vācyatayety uktam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1843: tena rajjvādipratipādakaṃ guṇā iveti na vācyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1844: nanu viśeṣaṇasāmyanibandhanā samāsoktir na ca nibadhnantīti viśeṣaṇam ity āha na hi viśeṣaṇasāmyam eveti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1845: etac cāsmābhir harṣacaritavārtike nirṇītam iti tata evāvadhāryam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1846: pṛthak tam upādāyeti tacchabdena śaśī parāmṛṣṭaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1851: tadanāśrayaṇenendunā rūpaṇaṃ tatpṛṣṭhe cendur ivety upamā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1852: nanu rājendur ity atra tūpamārūpakayor ekaparigrahe sādhakabādhakābhāvāt saṅkaro nyāyyaḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1854: tat katham uktaṃ rūpakam āsūtritam iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1857: upamāyā abhāve tu saṅkara evātra yuktaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1858: yad vopamāpekṣayā rūpakasyātra samāse sphuṭatvena pratīte rūpakaṃ saṃśritam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1859: anenaiva hy abhiprāyeṇa vakṣyati rūpakasya viṣaye upamāyā yatheti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1873: khalatām ityādāv upamotthāpite śleṣe nopamā śleṣaṃ bādhate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1875: śleṣas tu tām bādhate iti yuktam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1876: asya nyāyasyālaṅkārāntare 'pi bhāvād vyāptigarbham uktaṃ yad alaṅkāreti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1878: sati samāsoktyādinibandhane pūrvavat śleṣottāpitopamā na kartavyā syāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1883: tatra śleṣaviṣayatvam upamāviṣayatvaṃ ca yugapan na śaṅkanīyaṃ tayor utsargāpavādedabhāve na vyavasthiter ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1885: uktaṃ yac śleṣaviṣaye doṣadvayaṃ - yatra samāsoktiviṣaye śleṣaḥ kṛtaḥ śleṣaviṣaye copameti,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1888: śleṣopamādīnām alaṅkārāṇām abhivyaktyarthaṃ ye śabdā abjam ivetyādayaḥ tebhyo 'laṅkārebhya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1889: itaraḥ samāsoktiśleṣādiḥ tair eva śabdaiḥ alpatarair abjam ivetyādirahitair yadi
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1894: tat katham idam uktam ity āha - na hy astīti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1895: śobhātiśayajanane nije vyāpāre nāsty alaṅkārāṇāṃ viśeṣaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1896: tataś caiko gṛhyate 'paras tyajyata iti na yuktam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1897: gurulaghutvam āśritya punar yujyata etan nānyatheti tātparyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1898: vācyātiśayāpekṣayā caitad uktam pratīyamānatvāpekṣayā tu samanantaraṃ viśeṣo vakṣyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1899: kiṃ cetyādinā kāvyakriyāyāṃ saundaryaniṣpatteḥ prayojakatvam alaṅkāraniṣpatteś ca anuniṣpāditaṃ yathā vaktā vedanācāmayoḥ ity āha /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1906: atra samāsoktiśleṣabhaṅgibhyām eva ity etadgranthānusāreṇa rūpakasya viṣaye upamāyā yathetyādigranthaḥ prakṣipta iva lakṣyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1908: uktadoṣadvayayogāsiddheḥ ity asya ca pūrvoktagranthasyātra pakṣe nyūnatvād ataś caivāyaṃ kva cid ādarśe na paṭhyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1909: aprakṣepe tu trirūpakagrahaṇam iha kartvyaṃ syāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1910: tasmāt sa vā grantho nivārya iha vā rūpakagrahaṇaṃ prakṣepyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1915: ata eva bharate rasaniṣpattir ity atra rasānumitir iti vyākhyeyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1917: tadāśrayāḥ paraṃparayā rasāśrayā rasajñaptihetava ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1921: ataś cārutvaṃ yathā niṣpadyate tathā teṣām upanibandhaḥ kāryaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1923: nānvahādhānoddharaṇādaya ity uktyā alaṅkārāṇāṃ parasparaṃ cārutvaniṣpādane viśeṣaḥ pratipāditaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1924: pūrvaṃ ca na hy asti nije ityādinā viśeṣābhāva uktaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1927: pūrvam avavadhānena cārutvaniṣpādanaṃ manasikṛtya viśeṣābhāvaḥ pratipāditaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1928: iha tu vibhāvādyupakaraṇatvena gurulaghutvādinā viśeṣa ukta ity apekṣābhedā[n na] virodhaḥ kaś cit /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1930: adhunā yat pratijñāmātreṇa pratipāditaṃ yathā śabdasya śaktyantarābhāvād vyañjakatvaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1931: na saṃbhavati iti tadvācyāvacanodāharaṇatvopayogi śleṣaprasaṅgenopapādayitum āsūtrayati - sa cāyam iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1932: yas samāsoktiviṣaye kṛto yasya ca viṣaye upamā kṛtā sa ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1935: yatrānyūneti yatra viśeṣyasya viśeṣaṇaṃ na nyūnībhavati nāpy atiricyate,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1939: kartṛkarmarūpaḥ ādigrahaṇāt kriyārūpo yatra pradhānabhūto 'rthaḥ śleṣeṇa svarūpahāniṃ nīyate,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1940: na tatra śleṣo niravadya ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1941: tasya ca dharmapratipādakaśabdaviṣayatvena dharmipratipādakaśabdaviṣayatvena ca dvaividhyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1946: yāvad ivādi nibandhanaṃ nāśritaṃ tāvad arthāntaram apramāṇakam eveti śleṣābhivyaktyarthaṃ nibandhanam āśrayaṇīyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1947: atrāntare iti phullamallikābhir dhavalā ye 'ṭṭās tripuracatuṣpuramahāprakārā āpaṇā vā tair vikāso hāso yasya tadvac ca dhavalāṭṭahāso yasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1948: kusumasamayayugaṃ māsadvayaṃ ramyatvena tatsadṛśa ca yugaṃ kṛtādim upasaṃharan ajṛmbhata vikasitavān vyaktānanaś cābhūd mahākālo dīrghasamayaḥ saṃhartṛdevatāviśeṣaś ca /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1950: mahākāla ity atra mahāsamaya ity aśliṣṭe viśeṣyapade prayukte viśeṣaṇasāmyād eva devatāviśeṣapratīteḥ samāsoktir bhavantī mahākālaśabdasyāvṛttau pramāṇam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1951: na cātra mahākālaśabde prayukte prayāsaḥ kaś cit /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1952: yena alakālikuletivat samāsoktyā śleṣasya vaiyarthyaṃ śaṅkyeta /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1954: parvatapakṣe ācchāditaṃ vaipulyād diśaś cāmbaram ākāśaṃ ca yena,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1955: uccakair ucyatāṃ gāṃ bhūmiṃ cākramya vartamānaṃ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1958: evaṃvidhaṃ nageśaṃ parvatarājaṃ dṛṣṭvā ko na vismito bhavatīty arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1959: harapakṣe tu ācchāditaṃ paridhānīkṛta diśa eva asya nava vastraṃ yena,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1960: tathā u[k]taṃ sthūlaviṣāṇa ca vṛṣabham adhiruhya sthitaṃ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1961: mastake candrakalānvitaṃ ca nageśa kailāsādhipatiṃ sākṣātkṛtya anugṛhītammanyatvena ko na vismayata ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1967: kiṃ cit khalu vastuśaktyaiva kāryakāri yathā dīpādi /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1968: kiṃ cit tu parāmarśāpekṣaṃ yathā dhūmādi liṅgam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1969: yatra yasmin viṣaye parāmarśanairapekṣyeṇa vastuśaktyaivobhayakāritvaṃ tatra tantrādi nānyatra /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1971: parāmarśo na nirnibandhana iti nātra tantrādipravṛttiḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1990: kulayaś caṭakāḥ tad uktam - kuliḥ kuliṅgaś caṭakaḥ iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1991: te ca te śakuntāḥ śakunayaḥ teṣāṃ cakreṇa samūhena bhāsvatīnāṃ valabhīnāṃ hitāḥ anurūpā mattavāraṇāḥ aṅkaḥ cihnaṃ yasyāḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:2002: tasya vigalitasya plavo 'navasthānaṃ tena śabalaṃ vicitram /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:2005: madhuraḥ sukumāro yas taraṇitāpo raviprabhā tadyogena tāraṃ hṛdyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:2007: andhakārapaṅkaplava eva vigalanena nissāratvāc chavaḥ tasya laṅghanena vartmasu pakṣmasu dūramā aramaṇīyaśrīḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:2009: yad vā madhuratena makarandāsaṅgena raṇitaṃ guñjitaṃ yasyāḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:2012: atra ghanavartmaśabdasyopameyavācinaḥ śleṣe 'ntarbhāvāt dharmidharmobhayārthasyodāharaṇatve nyāyye dharmārthasyodāharaṇatvaṃ cintyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:2015: tathā anavarataṃ nayanaṃ prāpaṇaṃ yasya tena salilena sicyamāna ārdratvaṃ prāpyamāṇaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:2016: vipado lavaḥ sūkṣmabhāgo vipallavo vigatakisalayaś ca /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:2017: prarohati vistīrṇībhavati aṅkurāṃś ca muñcati dharmāṃś ca muñcati dharmārthatvam iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:2018: kila atra sthitam api dharmārthatvaṃ nopamānaviśeṣaṇatvāyālaṃ viśeṣaṇatvasya kakṣyāntarabhāvitvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:2022: anāvṛttau tu tasyām eva kakṣyāyāṃ viśeṣaṇatve upameyasvarūpāpahāraprasaṅga iti padārthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:2029: aṅkollākhyās taravaḥ teṣāṃ pallavā bhāsvanto yatra /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:2030: aṅkollaśabdaḥ prākṛtabhāṣāpadam api kavibhir atiprasiddhyā śleṣādiṣu prayujyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:2032: maithilīva śriyaṃ dhatte iti parimalena prayutam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:2034: tathā bhāsvān aṅke ullapan mukharaḥ lavākhyaḥ putro yatreti sāmānyenānyapadārtho gṛhyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:2040: yataḥ tena padena saṃbhavadapradhānārthenāpi pradhānabhūto 'rthaḥ saṃspṛṣṭaḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:2042: yatra ca pradhānāpradhānobhayārthasya dvirupādānam avaśyaṃ kāryam,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:2043: tatra daṇḍāpūpikayā tadekārthasya pradhānamātrārthasya śabdasya dvirupādānaṃ nyāyasiddham eva /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:2046: nanūpamānasya yadi viśeṣyatvaṃ nopameyaviśeṣaṇatvaṃ tat katham upameyasaṃbandhiny upamānasya vibhaktiḥ yathā vāgarthāv iva saṃpṛktau iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:2048: viśeṣaṇatvam avacchedakatvaṃ tac copamānasyopameyaṃ praty upamitikriyāyāṃ vidyata eva /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:2050: sthite viśeṣaṇatve tasya na viśeṣyavibhakter hāniḥ kā cit /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:2051: yat punar ihopamānaśabdasya viśeṣyavācitvam uktaṃ tad dharmitābhiprāyeṇa /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:2054: ataś caivāyaṃ strīva gacchati ṣaṇḍo 'yam ity upameyaliṅgaṃ na bhajate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:2056: tad uktam - guṇavacanānām āśrayato liṅgavacanāni bhavanti iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:2057: tad evam upamānam upameyavibhaktiṃ na na bhajate dharmitvaṃ ca na jahātīti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:2062: vākyabhedaprasaṅgād iti saṃbhavaty ekavākyatve vākyabhedaś ca neṣyate iti vākyabhedasya pratipattigauravavattvād dheyatvam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:2070: etad dāvāgniviśeṣaṇaṃ san nakulalakṣaṇam arthaṃ pratipādayatīti dharmidharmobhayātmatvam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:2081: abhimāna iti na tathā hṛdayaṅgamaḥ pāṭhaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:2082: anyonyam iti vasantam ity asya kesariṇam iti viśeṣaṇaṃ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:2083: siṃhapakṣe ca kesariṇam ity asya vasantam iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:2084: rūpyeti yaḥ kesarī pratītaḥ sa vasantasya rūpakatvena na tāṭasthyena /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:2085: evaṃ vasantam ity asya nivasanārthayoge 'pi vasantārthaḥ kesariṇo rūpakatvena yojanīyaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:2094: guṇavanto rajjuyuktā api ghaṭakāḥ saṅghaṭayitāro hrasvāś ca ghaṭāḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:2096: na tu vakṣyamāṇayuktyā pṛthivīvikārā vyākhyeyāḥ guṇavattvaghaṭakatvayor iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:2097: yady apy atra samīhitasiddhau hetutvena vyavasthitasya ghaṭakā ity asya pārthivā iti prati viśeṣaṇatvaṃ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:2098: tathāpi kūpa ivety upamāsāmarthyād viśeṣyatvam api ghaṭate //
